content: Thaus Vaajntxwv Daviv laug heev lawm, txawm yog muab choj rua nwg vuv tuab npaum le caag los yeej tsi suv nwg le.
Yog le ntawd, Daviv cov numtswv txhaj has rua Daviv has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thov koj tso lug rua peb moog nrhav ib tug ntxhais nkaujxwb lug nrug koj nyob tu koj, hab pw huv koj xubndlag kuas suv koj.”

Puab txhaj moog saib tej hluas nkauj kws zoo nkauj tshaaj plawg huv tebchaws Yixalayees, puab pum ib tug hluas nkauj nyob huv Sunees. Nwg npe hu ua Anpisas hab yog ib tug ntxhais kws zoo nkauj heev, puab txawm coj nwg lug rua vaajntxwv.
Txawm yog Anpisas zoo nkauj heev hab nwg zuv rawv tu vaajntxwv xwb los vaajntxwv yeej tsi nrug nwg pw ua nam txiv le lawm.

Thaus Axaloos tuag lawm, Daviv cov tub kws tseem ua neej nyob, Adauniyas yog tug hlub. Nwg nam yog Hankis. Adauniyas yog ib tug kws zoo raug heev, Daviv yeej tsi tau tshev nwg ib lus lossis nug nwg has tas, “Vim le caag koj ua le ko?” Adauniyas xaav ua vaajntxwv. Nwg npaaj tau ib cov tsheb neeg, ib cov neeg hab tsib caug leej txivneej nrug nwg ua ke.
Nwg moog saablaaj rua Yau-am, (tug kws nwg nam hu ua Xeluyas), hab saablaaj rua Anpiyathas kws yog tug povthawj, mas obtug pum zoo paab nwg.
Tabsis tug povthawj Xadaus, Npenayas kws yog Yehauyadas tug tub, Nathaas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug, Sime-is, Le-is hab cov tubrog kws zuv Daviv, tsi kaam tuaj Adauniyas tog.

Muaj ib nub Adauniyas moog tua yaaj, tua nyuj hab tua tej mivnyuas nyuj kws rog rog fij rua sau lub pobzeb naab, ze rua ntawm lub qhovdlej Elaunkees. Nwg caw Vaajntxwv Daviv cov tub ibtxha hab vaajntxwv cov numtswv kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas tuaj nrug nwg koom rooj mov ntawd,
tabsis nwg tsi caw nwg tug kwv nraab Xalumoos lossis Nathaas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug, lossis Npenayas lossis cov tubrog kws zuv vaajntxwv ib tug le.

Nathaas moog cuag Npasenpas kws yog Xalumoos nam hab nug has tas, “Koj tsi nov has tas Hankis tug tub Adauniyas, nwg tub tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv lawm los? Hab Vaajntxwv Daviv yeej tsi paub dlaabtsi txug zaaj nuav le.
Yog koj xaav tseg koj hab koj tug tub Xalumoos txujsa, mas kuv yuav paab koj tuav tswvyim,

koj ca le moog cuag Vaajntxwv Daviv taamsim nuav hab nug nwg has tas, ‘Vaajntxwv, koj tub yog tug coglug tseg ruaj khov rua kuv lawm has tas, koj yuav ca kuv tug tub Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw nua ne? Yog le caag nwgnuav Adauniyas tub ua vaajntxwv lawm?’ ”
Nathaas has ntxiv tas, “Ces thaus koj tseem taabtom nrug Vaajntxwv Daviv sis thaam, kuv yuav lawv koj qaab tuaj hab paab ua timkhawv rua koj txug zaaj nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Npasenpas txhaj moog cuag vaajntxwv rua huv nwg lub txaaj. Vaajntxwv laug heev lawm, mas Anpisas kws yog tug hluas nkauj nyob huv Sunees tuaj, nyob rawv huv tu vaajntxwv.
Npasenpas moog txhus caug ndlua nyo hau ntshis hawm vaajntxwv, vaajntxwv nug has tas, “Koj xaav tau dlaabtsi?”

Npasenpas teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, koj tub tuav tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv lub npe coglug ruaj khov tseg rua kuv lawm has tas, koj yuav ca kuv tug tub Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw tom qaab koj.
Tabsis nwgnuav Adauniyas tub sawv ua vaajntxwv lawm, hab koj tub tsi paub txug zaaj nuav hlo le.

Nwg muab ntau tug nyuj, ntau tug yaaj hab tej mivnyuas nyuj kws rog rog tua hlawv ua khoom fij hab nwg caw koj cov tub ibtxha, tug povthawj Anpiyathas hab Yau-am kws yog koj tug thawj tubrog moog koom nwg rooj mov ntawd, tabsis nwg tsi caw koj tug tub Xalumoos le.
Vaajntxwv, taagnrho tsoom pejxeem Yixalayees puavleej tog ntsoov koj, saib koj yuav qha puab has tas, koj tsaa leejtwg lug ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw.
Yog koj tsi mob sab rua zaaj nuav, ntshai thaus dlua koj lawm, luas yuav ntxeev sab ua phem rua kuv tug tub Xalumoos hab kuv.”
Thaus Npasenpas tseem taabtom has tej lug nuav, Nathaas txawm tuaj txug ndlua huv loog.
Ces muaj tuabneeg moog has rua vaajntxwv has tas, Nathaas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj cuag koj, Nathaas txawm moog rua huv hab txhus caug ndlua ntawm vaajntxwv xubndlag.
Ces Nathaas has tas, “Vaajntxwv, koj puas tau has kuas tsaa Adauniyas ua vaajntxwv hloov koj?

Nub nua nwg tub moog muab ntau tug nyuj, ntau tug yaaj hab tej mivnyuas nyuj kws rog rog tua hlawv ua khoom fij. Nwg caw taagnrho koj cov tub, Yau-am kws yog koj tug thawj tubrog  hab tug povthawj Anpiyathas, taamsim nuav puab taabtom nrug nwg noj haus hab qw ntshu nrooj has tas, ‘Thov kuas vaajntxwv Adauniyas muaj sa nyob txhab naj moog pua xyoo!’
Tabsis nwg tsi caw kuv lossis tug povthawj Xadaus lossis Npenayas lossis Xalumoos le.
Vaajntxwv, koj tub tso cai rua puab ua tej nuav, ua caag koj tsi qha rua koj tej numtswv paub has tas, tug twg yog tug lug ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw?”
Vaajntxwv Daviv teb has tas, “ca le moog hu Npasenpas rov lug huv nuav.”
Vaajntxwv has rua Npasenpas tas, “Kuv coglug rua koj ntawm tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob hab yog tug kws cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv tej kev txomnyem,
nub nua kuv yuav tsaa koj tug tub Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv hloov kuv chaw lawv le tej lug kws kuv tuav tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv lub npe coglug tseg rua koj lawm.”
Npasenpas nyo hau ntshis hawm hab has tas, “Thov kuas vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv muaj sa nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg lauj!”
Vaajntxwv Daviv tso tuabneeg moog hu Xadaus, Nathaas hab Npenayas kuas tuaj cuag nwg. Thaus puab tuaj txug huv lub loog lawm,

Vaajntxwv has rua puab tas, “Mej coj kuv cov numtswv kws saib kuv tej num nrug mej moog, hab muab kuv tug neeg luav rua kuv tug tub Xalumoos caij, hab coj nwg nqeg moog lawm nraag lub qhovdlej Nkihoos,

kuas Xadaus hab Nathaas obtug muab roj laub rua sau nwg taubhau tsaa nwg ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv. Mej ca le tshuab raaj tshuab xyu hab qw has tas, ‘Thov kuas Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muaj sa nyob txhab naj moog pua xyoo!’
Hab mej ca le nrug nwg lug, nwg yuav lug nyob sau kuv lub zwmtxwv hloov kuv chaw. Kuv yuav tsaa nwg ua tug kaav taagnrho cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas.”
Npenayas teb has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas tav lawv le koj has ko. Amees! Thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv paab kuas muaj lawv le ntawd.
Tug TSWV nrug nraim vaajntxwv nyob le caag, thov kuas nwg nrug nraim Xalumoos nyob ib yaam le ntawd, hab thov kuas nwg kev tswjfwm tseem vaammeej tshaaj ntu kws koj tswjfwm.”
Yog le ntawd, Xadaus, Nathaas, Npenayas hab cov tubrog kws zuv vaajntxwv txhaj le muab Xalumoos tsaws caij Vaajntxwv Daviv tug neeg luav hab coj nwg nqeg moog rua nraag lub Qhovdlej Nkihoos.

Tug cevlug Xadaus muab fwj roj txiv ntoo kws nwg nqaa huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub lug laub rua sau Xalumoos taubhau. Ces puab txawm tshuab raaj tshuab xyu hab taagnrho cov pejxeem suavdlawg qw ntshu nrooj has tas, “Thov kuas Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muaj sa nyob txhab naj moog pua xyoo lauj!”
Ces puab suavdlawg lawv Xalumoos qaab lug, qw lomzem zoo sab hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu nrov dloog dlaj ua aav tseeg nkawg lug tsev.
Thaus Adauniyas hab nwg cov qhua kws tseem taabtom noj mov, puab puavleej nov suab raaj suab xyu nrov. Yau-am txawm nug has tas, “Tej suab kws nrov dloog dlaj tom nroog tuaj yog dlaabtsi?”

Thaus kws nwg tseem has lug tsi tau xaus, tug povthawj Anpiyathas tug tub Yaunathaas tuaj txug ndlua. Ces Adauniyas txawm hu has tas, “Koj ca le lug ntawm nuav, koj yeej yog tuabneeg zoo, mas koj yuav coj tej xuv zoo tuaj qha rua kuv paub.”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Tsi yog le koj has ko! Vaajntxwv Daviv tub tsaa Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv lawm.
Nwg tso Xadaus, Nathaas, Npenayas hab nwg cov tubrog kws zuv vaajntxwv coj Xalumoos moog. Puab muab nwg tsaws caij vaajntxwv tug neeg luav,

ces Xadaus hab Nathaas tub muab roj laub rua nwg taubhau tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv nraag lub qhovdlej Nkihoos lawm. Puab suavdlawg txhaj rov lug rua huv nroog, puab qw ntshu nrooj zoo sab kawg, hab taamsim nuav cov pejxeem taabtom qw muaj kev lomzem heev. Mas yog cov suab kws puastaab koj nov ntawd ntaag.
Nwgnuav Xalumoos tub ua vaajntxwv lawm.

Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, cov numtswv puavleej moog hawm Vaajntxwv Daviv hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Thov koj tug Vaajtswv ua rua Xalumoos lub npe nyob muaj koob muaj meej tshaaj koj, hab thov kuas Xalumoos kev tswjfwm vaammeej tshaaj ntu kws koj tswjfwm.’ Ces Vaajntxwv Daviv txawm nyo ntshis rua sau nwg lub txaaj pehawm

hab thov has tas, ‘Peb ca le ua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsaug, nub nua nwg pub kuv caajceg ib tug lug ua vaajntxwv hloov kuv chaw, hab tseem ca kuv muaj sa nyob tau pum kag ntaag!’ ”
Ces Adauniyas cov qhua ntshai heev, puab txawm ca le sawv tsiv nyag moog nyag tsev taag lawm.
Adauniyas ntshai Xalumoos heev, nwg txhaj tsiv moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab tuav ob tug kub sau lub thaaj.

Muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Xalumoos has tas Adauniyas ntshai koj kawg le, nwg taabtom moog tuav ob tug kub sau lub thaaj hab has tas, “Nub nua thov kuas Vaajntxwv Xalumoos coglug rua kuv has tas, nwg yuav tsi tua nwg tug tubkhai povtseg.”

Xalumoos teb has tas, “Yog nwg ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, txawm yog nwg ib txuj nyuas plaubhau los yeej yuav tsi tu le; tabsis yog nwg ua tuabneeg ntxeev sab rua kuv, ces nwg yeej yuav raug tua tuag xwb.”
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tso tuabneeg moog coj Adauniyas nqeg sau lub thaaj lug. Adauniyas txhaj lug cuag vaajntxwv hab nyo ntshis hawm nwg, hab Vaajntxwv has rua nwg tas, “Koj ca le moog tsev.”
Thaus Daviv yuav tuag, nwg hu nwg tug tub Xalumoos lug ntuag hab cob num rua Xalumoos zag kawg has tas,
“Tub txug lub sijhawm kws kuv yuav tso lub nplajteb nuav tseg lawm. Koj ca le ua sab tawv qhawv,

ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv kuas koj ua. Hab coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kws muab sau tseg rua huv Mauxes Phoo Kevcai, koj txhaj yuav vaammeej, tsi has koj ua dlaabtsi lossis koj yuav moog qhov twg.

Tug TSWV yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua kuv has tas, ‘Yog koj cov tubki ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab coj lawv le kuv tej lug qha kawg sab kawg ntsws kawg plaab kawg plawv mas koj caajceg yuav tsi tu tug tuabneeg kws nyob sau cov Yixalayees lub zwmtxwv ib zag le.’

“Dlua le ntawd ntxiv, koj tub yeej paub lawm has tas Yau-am tau ua le caag rua kuv. Nwg tau tua cov Yixalayees ob tug thawj tubrog, Neles tug tub Aneles hab Yethes tug tub Amaxas. Koj ncu ntsoov has tas, nwg tua obtug povtseg thaus lub tebchaws muaj kev thaajyeeb pauj tej tuabneeg kws obtug tua thaus lub tebchaws tseem ua tsuv ua rog. Nwg tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim,  mas nwgnuav kuv txhaj tau ris lub txim kws nwg ua ntawd, hab raug kev txomnyem ntsuav  le nuav.
Koj yeej paub has tas, koj yuavtsum ua le caag rua nwg lawm; koj tsi xob pub nwg tuag suv sab so le.
“Koj yuavtsum ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua Npaxilais tug kws yog tuabneeg Nkile-as cov tub hab saib puab, rua qhov puab tau ua zoo heev rua kuv thaus kws kuv tsiv moog nkaum koj tug tijlaug Axaloos.

“Nub kws kuv moog huv lub nroog Mahana-ees, Nkelas tug tub Sime-is kws yog xeem Npeenyamees kws nyob huv lub nroog Npahulees tau tsawm foom kuv phem kawg le, tabsis thaus nwg tuaj tog kuv tom tug Dlej Yauladees, kuv tau tuav tug TSWV lub npe coglug rua nwg has tas, kuv yuav tsi tua nwg povtseg.
Tabsis nwgnuav, koj tsi xob ca nwg dlim dlawb dlim dlo. Koj yog tuabneeg txawj ntse, koj yeej paub has tas tsimnyog koj yuav ua le caag rua nwg lawm, koj ca le muab nwg tua povtseg.”
Daviv tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv Daviv lub nroog.
Daviv ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau plaub caug xyoo, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Henploos kaav tau xyaa xyoo, hab nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb caug peb xyoo.
Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg txiv Daviv chaw, hab nwg muaj fwjchim luj kaav lub tebchaws nyob ruaj khov.
Ces Adauniyas kws yog Hankis tug tub, moog cuag Npasenpas kws yog Xalumoos nam. Npasenpas nug has tas, “Puas yog koj tuaj ncaaj tuaj nceeg?” Adauniyas teb has tas, “Kuv yeej tuaj ncaaj tuaj nceeg,”
hab nwg has ntxiv tas, “Kuv muaj lu puav lug xaav nug koj.” Npasenpas teb has tas, “Koj xaav nug dlaabtsi?”

Adauniyas teb has tas, “Koj yeej paub has tas, kuv yuavtsum tau ua vaajntxwv hab txhua tug tuabneeg Yixalayees yeej pum zoo ca kuv ua. Tabsis muaj tej yaam txawv heev tshwm tuaj has tas kuv tug kwv tau ua vaajntxwv lawm, rua qhov yog tug TSWV pum zoo.
Mas nwgnuav kuv xaav yuav ib yaam ntawm koj; thov koj muab rua kuv.” Npasenpas nug has tas, “Yog dlaabtsi?”
Adauniyas teb has tas. “Koj ca le moog thov Xalumoos kuas nwg muab Anpisas kws yog tug hluas nkauj Sunees rua kuv yuav ua quaspuj, rua qhov kuv paub has tas, Xalumoos yuav ua le koj has.”
Npasenpas teb has tas, “Ua le ntawd, kuv maam moog paab koj thov vaajntxwv.”

Yog le ntawd, Npasenpas txhaj moog cuag vaajntxwv, hab coj Adauniyas cov lug moog has rua Xalumoos. Vaajntxwv sawv lug has lug zoo sab tog txais nwg nam, hab nyo ntshis hawm nwg nam. Xalumoos txawm moog nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv hab nwg muab ib lub rooj lug rua nwg nam nyob ntawm nwg saab xis.
Npasenpas has tas, “Kuv muaj mivntsiv lug tseemceeb xaav has rua koj; thov koj teb rua kuv.” Xalumoos teb has tas, “Nam, koj yuav has dlaabtsi? Kuv yeej yuav noog koj has.”
Npasenpas has tas, “Koj ca le muab Anpisas rua koj tug tijlaug Adauniyas yuav ua quaspuj.”

Vaajntxwv nug has tas, “Vim le caag koj tuaj thov kuas kuv muab Anpisas rua Adauniyas yuav? Koj ca le thov kuas kuv muab hlo kuv lub meejmom vaajntxwv rua nwg huv tuabsi! Rua qhov nwg yog kuv tug tijlaug, tug povthawj Anpiyathas hab Yau-am los tub tuaj nwg tog lawm hab!”
Ces Xalumoos txhaj tuav tug TSWV lub npe coglug has tas, “Yog kuv tsi muab Adauniyas tua povtseg pauj qhov kws nwg thov nuav, ces thov Vaajtswv muab kuv tua povtseg!

Tug TSWV yog tug tsaa kuv muaj meejmom lug nyob sau kuv txiv lub zwmtxwv; Vaajtswv tau ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg hab muab lub tebchaws nuav rua kuv hab kuv cov xeebntxwv kaav. Kuv thov coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj txujsa nyob has tas, Adauniyas yuavtsum tuag nub nua.”
Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xalumoos txhaj kuas Npenayas moog muab Adauniyas tua tuag lawm.

Vaajntxwv Xalumoos has rua tug povthawj Anpiyathas has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog nyob huv koj lub nroog Anathaus kws yog koj lub zog. Koj yeej tsimnyog tuag lawm, tabsis kuv yuav tsi tua koj kuas tuag taamsim nuav. Vim thaus koj nrug kuv txiv Daviv nyob, koj tau ua tug saib lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab koj tau nrug kuv txiv tiv tej kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv lug lawm.”

Ces Xalumoos muab Anpiyathas rhu tawm tsi pub ua povthawj ua tug TSWV teg num ntxiv lawm, hab yeej muaj tseeb lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV tau has txug Elis hab nwg cov xeebntxwv huv lub nroog Silaus lawm.

Thaus Yau-am nov dlheev has tas, muaj tej xwm nuav lawm, (nwg yog tug kws tuaj Adauniyas tog, tabsis nwg tsi tuaj Axaloos tog.) Nwg txawm tsiv moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub, hab moog tuav ob tug kub sau lub thaaj.

Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos has tas, “Yau-am tsiv moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab moog sawv ntawm lub thaaj lawm.” Xalumoos txhaj has rua Yehauyadas tug tub Npenayas has tas, “Koj ca le moog muab Yau-am tua povtseg.”

Npenayas txhaj moog rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab has rua Yau-am has tas, “Vaajntxwv has kuas koj ca le tawm lug!” Yau-am teb has tas, “Kuv tsi lug! Kuv yuav tuag rua ntawm nuav xwb.” Npenayas txhaj rov lug pav Yau-am tej lug rua vaajntxwv noog.

Xalumoos has tas, “Kawgkag moog ua le nwg has ntaag; muab nwg tua hab muab log kag xwb, kuas kuv lossis Daviv cov xeebntxwv txhaj tsi tau ris lub txim kws Yau-am tua cov tuabneeg tsi muaj txim ntawd ntxiv lawm.

Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua Yau-am, vim tej kev tua tuabneeg kws nwg txhobtxwm tua  tsi pub kuv txiv Daviv paub. Yau-am tau muab Neles tug tub Aneles kws yog cov Yixalayees tug thawj tubrog hab Yethes tug tub Amaxes kws yog cov Yudas tug thawj tubrog kws ncaaj nceeg hab tsimtxaj tshaaj nwg tua povtseg.
Lub txim tua tuabneeg ntawd txhaj poob lug rua Yau-am hab nwg cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis le. Tabsis tug TSWV yuav tsaa Daviv cov xeebntxwv lug nyob sau Daviv lub zwmtxwv moog le.”
Yog le ntawd, Npenayas txhaj moog rua tom tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub, hab muab Yau-am tua tuag lawm, hab muab nwg log rua huv nwg lug tsev kws nyob tom ntug nroog.
Vaajntxwv txhaj tsaa Npenayas kws yog cov Yudas tug thawj tubrog hloov Yau-am chaw, hab muab tug povthawj Xadaus hloov Anpiyathas chaw.
Vaajntxwv has moog rua Sime-is has tas, “Koj ca le ua ib lub tsev rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav rua koj nyob. Koj nyob huv tsev hab tsi xob tawm huv lub nroog moog qhov twg le.
Yog koj tseem tawm hab hlaa tug dlej Kiloos moog rua saab tid, mas koj yeej yuav raug tua tuag xwb, hab koj cov ntshaav yuav rov lug ywg koj taubhau.”
Sime-is teb has tas, “Ua le ntawd los mas vaajntxwv, kuv yuav ua lawv le koj has ntaag.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tau ntev heev.
Tau peb xyoos tom qaab nuav, Sime-is ob tug tubqhe tsiv moog cuag Ma-akas tug tub Akhises kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Nkas. Thaus Sime-is nov has tas, obtug nyob huv lub nroog Nkas,
nwg txawm muab eeb pem rua nwg tug neeg luav hab caij moog cuag Vaajntxwv Akhises huv lub nroog Nkas, moog nrhav nwg ob tug tubqhe. Nwg nrhav tau obtug hab coj obtug rov lug tsev.
Thaus Xalumoos nov txug tej kws Sime-is tau ua ntawd,

nwg txhaj has moog rua Sime-is has tas, “Kuv puas tau tuav tug TSWV lub npe coglug rua koj has tas, tsi pub koj tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav moog rua saab nrau le. Hab kuv tub ceebtoom rua koj has tas, yog koj tawm huv nuav moog, koj yuav raug tua tuag. Koj tub yeej los zoo sab le ntawd hab koj has tas, koj yuav noog kuv lug nua ne?
Yog le caag koj yuav rhuav koj tej lug cog tseg hab tsi noog kuv tej lug saamfwm le?
Koj yeej paub txhua yaam kws koj tau ua txhum rua kuv txiv lawm. Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua koj vim lub txim ntawd.
Tabsis nwg yuav foom koob moov rua kuv hab nwg yuav ua kuas Daviv lub tebchaws nyob ruaj khov moog ibtxhis le.”
Ces Vaajntxwv txhaj kuas Npenayas moog muab Sime-is tua povtseg lawm. Txij thaus ntawd lug, Xalumoos kev tswjfwm txhaj nyob thaajyeeb lug le lawm.

Xalumoos moog yuav Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj kuas cog tau kev phoojywg. Nwg coj tug quaspuj ntawd lug nyob rua huv Daviv lub nroog moog txug thaus nwg ua tau nwg lub loog, ua tau lub Tuamtsev hab ua tau tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog Yeluxalees tav lawm.
Thaus ntawd tseem tsi tau ua lub Tuamtsev rua tug TSWV, mas cov Yixalayees suavdlawg txhaj pheej moog tua tsaj hlawv fij nyob sau tej ncov roob xwb.
Xalumoos muab sab npuab tug TSWV hab ua lawv le nwg txiv Daviv tej lug qhuab ntuag, tsuas yog nwg tseem pheej moog tua tsaj hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab fij sau tej ncov roob xwb.

Muaj ib nub Xalumoos moog tua tsaj fij nyob peg Nkinpe-oos, rua qhov lub thaaj tseemceeb tshaaj plawg nyob qhov ntawd. Nwg tub yeej moog tua txug le ib txheeb tug tsaj hlawv fij rua sau lub thaaj ntawd lawm.
Mo ntawd tug TSWV lug tshwm rua nwg pum huv nruab npau suav huv Nkinpe-oos hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj xaav kuas kuv muab dlaabtsi rua koj?”

Xalumoos teb has tas, “Koj yeej ibtxwm hlub kuv txiv Daviv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, hab nwg yeej ibtxwm ua zoo, muab sab npuab koj hab muaj kev ncaaj nceeg nrug koj sis raug zoo. Koj tseem hlub nwg lug txug naj nub nua tsi tso nwg tseg, nub nua koj txhaj tsaa nwg tug tub lug hloov nwg chaw.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv, koj tsaa kuv ua vaajntxwv hloov kuv txiv chaw, txawm yog kuv tseem hluas hab tsi muaj tswvyim tswj lub tebchaws nuav los xij.
Nwgnuav kuv nrug cov tuabneeg kws koj tau xaiv tseg ua koj tug lawm nyob, cov tuabneeg nuav coob heev, tsi muaj leejtwg suav txheeb le.

Yog le ntawd, thov koj pub kuas kuv muaj tswvyim tswjfwm koj tsaav tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab paub qhov phem qhov zoo. Yog kuv tsi muaj tswvyim, kuv yuav ua le caag tswjfwm tau koj tsaav tuabneeg kws coob heev nuav?”
Tug TSWV txaus sab heev rua tej kws Xalumoos thov nuav.

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Vim koj thov kuas kuv pub tswvyim rua koj tswjfwm lub tebchaws moog rua qhov ncaaj nceeg, tabsis koj tsi tau thov kuas koj muaj sa nyob ntev lossis muaj nyaj muaj txaj lossis kuas koj tej yeebncuab tuag,
mas kuv yuav muab tej kws koj thov ntawd rua koj. Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj tswvyim hab txawj ntse tshaaj tej tuabneeg kws nyob ua ntej koj lossis cov kws nyob tom qaab koj.
Kuv tseem yuav muab tej kws koj tsi thov pub huv tuabsi rua koj hab: koj yuav muaj txag npluanuj, hab muaj meejmom moog taag koj simneej, tshaaj lwm tug vaajntxwv huv tuabsi.
Yog koj noog kuv lug, ceev kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm ib yaam le koj txiv Daviv tau ua lug lawm, kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev.”

Xalumoos tsim dlheev lug hab paub has tas, yog Vaajtswv lug has rua nwg huv nruab npau suav. Ces nwg txawm rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab moog sawv ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV, hab tom qaab ntawd nwg ua ib rooj mov rua nwg cov numtswv suavdlawg noj.
Muaj ib nub ob tug namndlav tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tim ntsej tim muag.
Muaj ib tug has tas, “Vaajntxwv, tug quaspuj nuav hab kuv koom nyob ua ke huv ib lub tsev, thaus nwg lug nrug kuv nyob tsi ntev, kuv txawm yug tau kuv tug tub huv lub tsev ntawd.
Tau ob nub tom qaab kws kuv yug tau kuv tug tub, nwg txawm yug tau ib tug tub hab. Huv lub tsev ntawd tsuas muaj wb ob leeg nyob xwb, tsi muaj leejtwg nrug wb nyob le.
Ces muaj ib mos nwg txawm pw tsuam nwg tug mivnyuas tuag lawm.

Mo ntawd thaus kuv tseem tsaug zug, nwg txawm sawv lug tsaws kuv tug mivnyuas ntawm kuv ib saab coj moog rua ntawm nwg lub txaaj lawm; ces nwg txawm muab nwg tug mivnyuas kws tuag lawm lug tso rua ntawm kuv lub txaaj.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv, thaus kuv tsim lug hab muab mig rua kuv tug mivnyuas noj, ua cav nwg tub tuag lawm. Kuv maam ua tuab zoo saib tseeb tseeb na ua caag tsi yog kuv tug mivnyuas.”

Tabsis dlua lwm tug quaspuj has tas, “Tub tsi yog los sav. Tug mivnyuas kws tuag lawm yeej yog koj tug, tug kws tseem caj yog kuv tug!” Thawj tug quaspuj txawm teb ndlais has tas, “Tsi yog le ntawd! Tug mivnyuas kws tuag yeej yog koj tug, tug kws tseem caj yeej yog kuv tug tag!” Ob tug txawm sis caav ntawg ntag taabmeeg Vaajntxwv.
Ces Vaajntxwv Xalumoos txawm has tas, “Meb nyag taug nyag txeeb has tas, tug caj yog kuv tug, hab tsi muaj leejtwg leeg tug tuag ntawd yog nwg tug le.”
Vaajntxwv txhaj kuas muab ib raab ntaaj lug rua nwg, thaus puab nqaa raab ntaaj lug cev rua vaajntxwv lawm,
nwg has tas, “Muab tug mivnyuas kws tseem caj phua ua ob saab hab muab faib rua ob tug quaspuj nuav ib leeg ib saab.”

Ces tug kws yog leej nam tag, nwg mob sab hab hlub nwg tug tub heev, nwg txhaj le has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thov koj tsi xob tua tug mivtub nuav! Ca le muab rua nwg yuav xwb!” Tabsis dlua lwm tug quaspuj teb has tas, “Tsi xob muab nwg rua wb ib leeg tug twg le; ca le muab nwg phua kag ua ob saab xwb!”
Ces Xalumoos has tas, “Tsi xob muab tug mivnyuas nuav tua! Ca le muab rua thawj tug quaspuj, nwg yeej yog leej nam tag.”
Thaus cov Yixalayees nov Xalumoos txav rooj plaub ntawd, puab suavdlawg ntshai hab fwm nwg heev, rua qhov puab paub has tas, yog Vaajtswv pub tswvyim rua nwg txav plaub ntug ncaaj nceeg tag.
Xalumoos ua Vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees,
hab cov nuav yog nwg cov numtswv: Tug povthawj yog Axaliyas tug tub Xadaus
Ob tug teev ntawv yog Sisas ob tug tub, Elihaules hab Ahiyas tug saib tej ntaub ntawv yog Ahilus tug tub Yehausafas
Tug thawj tubrog yog Yehauyadas tug tub Npenayas. Ob tug povthawj yog Xadaus hab Anpiyathas
Tug thawj ntawm cov tswvxeev yog Nathaas tug tub Axaliyas Vaajntxwv tug tuavxaam yog Nathaas tug tub Xanpus kws yog tug povthawj.
Tug kws saib cov tubkhai huv lub loog yog Ahisas Tug kws saib cov ua num yog Anpidas tug tub Adaunilaas.

Xalumoos tsaa kaum ob leeg txivneej lug ua tswvxeev kaav cov Yixalayees txhua lub xeev. Puab yog cov coj zaub mov huv tej cheebtsaam tuaj rua vaajntxwv hab nwg tsev tuabneeg noj. Ib tug tswvxeev coj zaub mov tuaj rua vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg ib xyoos twg ib zag.
Ntawm nuav moog yog kaum ob tug tswvxeev ntawd cov npe hab tej cheebtsaam kws puab saib: Npehus: saib saablaaj roob Efalayees
Npedekes: saib lub nroog Makaxes, Sa-anpimes, Npethes Semes, Eloos hab Npethes Hanas
Npehexes: saib lub nroog Alunpus, Xukaus hab taagnrho cheebtsaam Hefeles
Npenanpinadas: (tug kws yuav Xalumoos tug ntxhais Tafas) saib taagnrho cheebtsaam Daules

Ahilus tug tub Npa-anas: saib lub nroog Tanas, Menkidaus, hab taagnrho cheebtsaam kws nyob ze Npethes Se-as, hab ze rua ntawm lub nroog Xalethaas saab qaabteb ntawm lub nroog Yexelees, moog txug ndlua rua tim lub nroog Anpees Mehulas hab tim lub nroog Yaumees

Npenkenpes: saib lub nroog Lamaus huv lub cheebtsaam Nkile-as hab cov zog kws nyob huv lub cheebtsaam Nkile-as kws yog Manaxes tug tub Yais tug xeebntxwv tug, hab cheebtsaam Ankunpes huv lub xeev Npasaas, taagnrho rau caum lub nroog luj kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv khov kho, hab muaj tej nqaaj roojvaag tooj
Idaus tug tub Ahinadas: saib cheebtsaam Mahana-ees
Ahima-as (tug kws yuav Xalumoos tug ntxhais Npasemas;) saib cheebtsaam Nafetalis
Husais tug tub Npa-anas: saib cheebtsaam Aseles hab lub nroog Npe-alaus
Palu-as tug tub Yehausafas: saib cheebtsaam kws cov Ixakhas nyob
Elas tug tub Sime-is: saib cheebtsaam kws cov Npeenyamees nyob

Ulis tug tub Nkenpeles: saib lub cheebtsaam Nkile-as kws cov Amaules tug Vaajntxwv Xihoos kaav hab lub xeev Npasaas kws Vaajntxwv Aunkas kaav. Dlua le kaum ob tug tswvxeev nuav lawm, tseem muaj ib tug thawj kws saib taagnrho lub tebchaws hab.
Cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees fuamvaam coob ib yaam le tej xuabzeb nraag ntug havtxwv; puab muaj noj muaj haus hab muaj kev zoo sab kawg le.

Xalumoos kaav taagnrho cov tebchaws kws nyob ibncig ze ntawd, txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates moog txug rua tim tebchaws Filitees, hab moog txug rua nraag tug nrimteb tebchaws Iziv. Puab puavleej them se rua Xalumoos hab ua nwg qhev moog taag nwg tam neej ntawm le.
Tej zaub mov kws Xalumoos xaav tau txhua nub, yog ib puas tsib caug tawb moov nplej, hab peb puas tawb zaub;
kaum tug nyuj rog rog kws fwb huv nkuaj, neeg nkaum tug nyuj kws tso rua huv tshaav zaub hab ib puas tug yaaj; dlua le ntawd, tseem muaj maum muaslwj, kauv, phaws muaslwj hab qab sis.

Xalumoos kaav taagnrho cov tebchaws kws nyob saab nubpoob, txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates moog txug rua ntawm lub nroog Nkaxas. Taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws nyob saab nubpoob ntawm tug Dlej Efalates puavleej coj khoom tuaj rua Xalumoos, hab nwg moog cog kev phoojywg nrug tej tebchaws nruab ze taagnrho.
Txij le Xalumoos tam, cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees ua neej nyob kaaj sab lug, txhua yim nyag txhaj cog muaj nyag txiv maab hab txiv ncuav pas.
Xalumoos muaj plaub caug txheeb lub nkuaj neeg kaw nwg cov neeg hai tsheb hab muaj kaum ob txheeb tug tubrog caij neeg.

Xalumoos kaum ob tug tswvxeev, ib tug twg raug ua num rua nwg ib lub hlis, yog muab tej zaub mov kws vaajntxwv Xalumoos xaav tau coj tuaj rua nwg, kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub loog tau noj; puab muab txhua yaam kws Xalumoos xaav tau tuaj rua nwg.
Hab txhua tug tswvxeev puavleej coj puab tej nplej hab quavnyaab npleg pub neeg tuaj rua ntawm qhov chaw kws ca tej ntawd,  rua cov neeg hai tsheb hab cov neeg kws siv ua lwm yaam num tau noj.
Vaajtswv pub rua Xalumoos muaj tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse tub heev ntsuag tsi tau hab ntau ib yaam le tej xuabzeb nraag ntug havtxwv.
Xalumoos ntse tshaaj cov tub txawg tub ntse kws nyob saab nubtuaj lossis tej tub txawg tub ntse kws nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm hab.

Nwg ntse tshaaj lwm tug txivneej huv tuabsi: ntse tshaaj Ethas kws yog tuabneeg Exelas, Hemaas, Kakaus hab Dadas kws yog Mahaules cov tub, hab Xalumoos lub koob meej nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg tej tebchaws kws nyob puagncig ntawd.
Nwg sau tau peb txheeb zaaj paajlug, hab ib txheeb tsib zaaj nkauj.
Nwg has txug tej ntoo hab tej nroj tsuag, tej ntoo cab peg Roob Lenpanoos, hab tej nroj hixauv kws tuaj ntawm tej ntsaa yeej; nwg has txug tej tsaj, tej noog, tej kaab hab tej ntseg huv tuabsi.
Taagnrho tej vaajntxwv kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav puavleej nov Xalumoos tej tswvyim hab xaa puab cov tuabneeg tuaj noog Xalumoos pav nwg tej kev txawj ntse.

Vaajntxwv Hilaas kws kaav lub nroog Tiles yeej ibtxwm nrug Daviv ua phoojywg, thaus nwg nov has tas Xalumoos tau ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg txiv Daviv chaw lawm, Hilaas txhaj tso ib cov numtswv tuaj cuag Xalumoos.
Xalumoos txhaj xaa xuv rov moog rua Hilaas has tas:

“Koj yeej paub kuv txiv Daviv ibtxwm ua rog rua nwg cov yeebncuab kws nyob huv tej tebchaws puagncig nwg, mas nwg txhaj tsi muaj cuabkaav ua lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv moog txug thaus tug TSWV pub nwg ntaus yeej taagnrho nwg cov yeebncuab lawm.

Tabsis nwgnuav tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv pub rua kuv lub tebchaws nyob thaajyeeb thoob plawg txhua phaab huv tuabsi. Kuv tsi muaj yeebncuab hab tsi muaj kev sis ntaus sis tua kws txaus ntshai lawm.

Tug TSWV coglug tseg rua kuv txiv Daviv has tas, ‘Koj tug tub kws kuv yuav tsaa ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw, nwg yog tug kws yuav ua lub Tuamtsev rua kuv.’ Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav kuv txhaj npaaj ua lub Tuamtsev, kuas tau qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.

Yog le ntawd, thov koj cov tuabneeg moog txav cov ntoo cab peg Roob Lenpanoos xaa tuaj rua kuv. Kuv cov tuabneeg yuav nrug puab ua num ua ke, hab kuv yuav them nqe rua koj cov tuabneeg lawv le koj pum zoo. Koj yeej paub has tas, kuv cov tuabneeg yeej ibtxwm tsi txawj ntuv ntoo le koj cov.”

Thaus Hilaas tau nov Xalumoos cov lug nuav lawm, nwg txaus sab heev, Hilaas has tas, “Nub nua ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg pub Daviv muaj ib tug tub ntse heev lug ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw kaav tsaav tuabneeg kws coob tshaaj plawg lawm!”
Ces Hilaas txawm xaa xuv rov moog rua Xalumoos has tas, “Kuv tau txais koj cov lug lawm, kuv zoo sab ua lawv le koj tej lug thov. Kuv yuav muab cov ntoo cab hab ntoo thuv tuaj pub rua koj.

Kuv cov tuabneeg yuav hai cov ntoo sau roob Lenpanoos moog rua nraag havtxwv hab yuav muab paav ua tej kheev nkuam lawv ntug dlej tuaj kuas txug qhov chaw kws koj tau teem tseg. Kuv cov tuabneeg maam muab dlaws, muab teeb ua ke, hab muab cob rua koj cov tuabneeg. Ces thov koj xaa zaub mov tuaj pub kuv cov tuabneeg noj xwb tau lawm.”
Hilaas txhaj le xaa ntoo cab hab ntoo thuv tuaj rua Xalumoos lawv le nwg xaav tau,
hab ib xyoos twg Xalumoos xaa ib puas txheeb tawb nplej, hab xaa cov roj txiv ntoo kws tsi xyaw lwm yaam le, ib puas kaum txheeb thoob  moog rua Hilaas cov tuabneeg tau noj.
Tug TSWV pub tswvyim rua Xalumoos lawv le tug TSWV tau coglug tseg lawm. Hilaas hab Xalumoos muaj kev sis raug zoo heev, obtug txhaj le coglug ua phoojywg.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos sau tau peb caug txheeb leej txivneej nyob thoob plawg huv tebchaws Yixalayees tuaj ua tub zug.

hab nwg tsaa Adaunilaas ua tug saib cov tub zug ntawd. Nwg muab puab faib ua peb paab, ib paab kaum txheeb leej, hab muab puab sis hloov ua num, ib paab moog ua num peg roob Lenpanoos ib hlis hab rov lug tsev ob hlis.
Xalumoos tseem muaj dlua yim caum txheeb leej txivneej ua num txaug pobzeb peg laaj roob hab xyaa caum txheeb leej txivneej ua cov nqaa pobzeb,
hab nwg tsaa peb txheeb peb puas leej ua cov saib hab qha puab ua num.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos saamfwm kuas puab yuavtsum txav tej dlaim txag zeb luj hab zoo nkauj lug pua lub plaag Tuamtsev.
Xalumoos hab Hilaas cov tub zug hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Npenpas sis paab nroog txaug pobzeb hab txav ntoo lug ua lub Tuamtsev.

Thaus Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tau plaub xyoos, xyoo plaub thaus lub ob hlis ntuj kws hu ua hli Xiv, Xalumoos txawm pib ua lub Tuamtsev, suav txij thaus cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug txug lub sijhawm kws Xalumoos ua lub Tuamtsev ntawd, tau plaub puas yim caum xyoo.
Lub Tuamtsev saab huv nruab nrog ntev rau caum tshim, dlaav peb caug tshim, hab sab peb caug tshim.
Chaav ntawm lub qhovrooj moog rua huv, tub kaum tshim, ntev neeg nkaum tshim, hab dlaav ib yaam le Chaav Dlawbhuv.
Lub Tuamtsev muaj qhovrais thoob plawg txhua saab phaab ntsaa. Tej qhovrais ntawd saab nrau nqaim dlua saab huv.
Lub Tuamtsev saab nrau tseem muaj dlua peb txheej rua saab qaum tsev hab ob tog, ib txheej twg sab tsib tshim.

Txheej huv qaab kawg, ib chaav twg dlaav tsib tshim. Txheej nruab nraab ib chaav twg dlaav rau tshim, hab txheej kawg sau u ib chaav twg dlaav xyaa tshim. Lub Tuamtsev tej phaab ntsaa ob txheej sau xov nyag dlua txheej huv qaab. Tej chaav ntawd ib txheej txawb rua ib txheej tsi muaj laag ntoo ntsa tuav tej phaab ntsaa ntawd le.
Tej pobzeb kws ua lub Tuamtsev ntawd, yeej txaug tau zoo zoo ntawm qhov chaw txaug lug lawm, yog le ntawd thaus coj lug ua txhaj tsi muaj suab rauj, suab taus lossis lwm yaam cuabyeej nrov le.
Lub qhovrooj txheej huv qaab  kws nyob ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nraag, muaj ntaiv nce moog rua sau txheej ob hab txheej peb.
Xalumoos muab tej txag ntoo thuv lug ntsa vuv thoob plawg saab huv. Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xalumoos txhaj ua lub Tuamtsev tav lawm.
Peb txheej kws nwg ua ncig lub Tuamtsev saab nrau,  ib txheej twg sab tsib tshim, hab muab tej txag ntoo thuv lug ntsa npuab khov kho rua.
Tug TSWV has rua Xalumoos has tas,
“Has txug lub Tuamtsev kws koj taabtom ua ntawd, yog koj ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab noog kuv tej lug saamfwm, kuv yuav paab koj lawv le tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua koj txiv Daviv lawm.
Kuv yuav nrug nraim kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees nyob huv lub Tuamtsev kws koj ua nuav, hab kuv yuav tsi tso puab tseg ib zag le.”
Xalumoos ua lub Tuamtsev tav lawm.
Saab phaab ntsaa huv lub Tuamtsev puavleej muab tej txag ntoo thuv xov huv taw moog nto plawg rua sau qaab nthaab, hab muab tej txag ntoo cab lug pua thoob plawg lub plaag tsev.

Chaav huv nruab nrog kws hu ua Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus, yog chaav kws nyob tom qaab huv lub Tuamtsev, chaav ntawd qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tshim hab puavleej muab txag ntoo thuv xov huv taw moog nto plawg rua sau qaab nthaab.
Chaav kws nyob ntawm hauv ntej Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus ntev plaub caug tshim.

Tej txag ntoo thuv kws xov lub Tuamtsev mas puavleej muab txaug txaij nraug zeeg ua dluab plhaub taub hab ua dluab paaj ntoos huv tuabsi; saab huv nruab nrog xov txag ntoo thuv thoob plawg tsi pum ib qhov ntsaa pobzeb tshwm le.
Chaav kws ua rua huv lub Tuamtsev tom qaab kawg nkaus, yog chaav kws muab lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg coj moog tso rua huv.
Chaav nuav ntev neeg nkaum tshim, dlaav neeg nkaum tshim hab sab neeg nkaum tshim, yog muab kub vuam thoob plawg. Xalumoos muab txag ntoo thuv  ntsa npuab thoob plawg lub thaaj.
Muab kub vuam thoob plawg lub Tuamtsev saab huv, hab muab tej saw kub caab hlaa txujkev kws moog rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv kws muab kub vuam thoob plawg ntawd.
Xalumoos muab kub vuam lub Tuamtsev saab huv thoob plawg, ib yaam le lub thaaj kws nyob huv Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus.
Muab ntoo roj txaug ua ob tug qhelunpees kws muaj tis coj moog txawb rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus, ib tug twg sab kaum tshim.
Ob tug qhelunpees ntawd luj sis luag zog hab zoo ib yaam nkaus. Hab puavleej muaj tis, ib saab tis twg ntev tsib tshim, saab ntsis tis tom nuav moog rua saab ntsis tis tom u ntev kaum tshim.

Puab muab ob tug qhelunpees ntawd coj moog txawb sis ncaag zog rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv kawg nkaus, kuas ob tug qhelunpees ntawd nthuav tis tuaj sis cob rua huv nruab nraab, hab dlua le ob saab tis nthuav moog ti nkaus rua tim phaab ntsaa.
Ob tug qhelunpees ntawd puavleej muab kub vuam thoob plawg huv tuabsi.
Cov phaab ntsaa huv Chaav luj hab Chaav Dlawbhuv, mas luas muab txaug ua dluab qhelunpees, ua tej tsob toovlaaj hab ua paaj ntoos txaij raug zeeg zoo nkauj kawg le.
Txawm yog lub plaag tsev los yeej vuam kub thoob plawg hab.
Muab ntoo roj ua ob dlaim txag qhovrooj rua lub qhovrooj kws moog huv Chaav Dlawbhuv kawg nkaus; lub qhovrooj ntawd sau kawg luas muab txaug ua tsib ceg.

Ob dlaim txag qhovrooj ntawd los yeej muab txaug ua dluab qhelunpees, ua dluab toovlaaj hab ua paaj ntoos txaij raug zeeg zoo nkauj kawg le. Luas muab kub vuam rua cov dluab qhelunpees hab cov dluab toovlaaj kws txaug rua ntawm ob dlaim txag qhovrooj ntawd huv tuabsi.
Luas muab ntoo roj ua ob tug ncej qhovrooj rua lub qhovrooj kws moog rua huv Chaav luj, lub qhovrooj ntawd ua plaub faab.
Luas muab ntoo cab ua ob dlaim txag qhovrooj kaw tuaj sis twb
hab muab txaug ua dluab qhelunpees, ua dluab toovlaaj hab ua paaj ntoos txaij raug zeeg zoo nkauj kawg le, hab muab kub vuam rua huv tuabsi.
Chaav luj nyob huv lub Tuamtsev hauv ntej, mas luas xov peb txheej pobzeb, ib txheej pobzeb twg, xov ib txheej txag ntoo thuv quas.
Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv tau plaub xyoos, ces xyoo plaub thaus lub ob hlis ntuj kws hu ua hli Xiv, nwg txawm pib ua lub Tuamtsev.

Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv kaav tau kaum ib xyoos rua thaus lub yim hli ntuj kws hu ua hli Npules, ces nwg ua lub Tuamtsev tav rua thaus ntawd lawv le nwg tau npaaj tseg lawm. Xalumoos ua lub Tuamtsev ntawd tau xyaa xyoo txhaj le tav.
Xalumoos tseem ua tau ib lub loog rua nwg, hab nwg siv sijhawm kaum peb xyoos ua lub loog ntawd txhaj le tav.

Nwg ua ib chaav tsev hu ua Chaav Tsev Haav Zoov Lenpanoos,  ntev ib puas tshim hab sab peb caug tshim. Chaav tsev ntawd muaj peb  leej ncej ntoo thuv, ib leej yog kaum tsib tug ncej kws puavleej muab cov nqaaj ntoo thuv dlhos rua sau cov hauv ncej ntawd. Nwg muab cov txag ntoo thuv ntsa ua qaab nthaab, ntsa thoob plawg moog rua tom chaav rau khoom huv tuabsi, hab muab cov ncej ntawd txheem paab.
Ib saab phaab ntsaa twg muaj peb leej qhovrais.
Cov ncej qhovrooj hab cov qhovrais  puavleej ua plaub faab, hab peb leej qhovrais ntawm txhua saab phaab ntsaa puavleej nyob sis ncaag zog.
Chaav kws txhus cov ncej zeb ntev tsib caug tshim hab dlaav peb caug tshim. Chaav ntawd muaj ib lub hauvmum hab muaj cov ncej zeb txheem paab.
Chaav ntawm lub zwmtxwv, hu ua chaav txav txim, yog chaav kws Xalumoos txav plaub ntug, chaav ntawd nwg muab cov txag ntoo thuv xov huv taw ntsaa moog nto plawg rua sau qaab nthaab.

Muaj dlua ib ceg tsev nyob rua saab tom qaab chaav txav plaub ntug yog chaav kws Xalumoos nyob. Chaav ntawd ua zoo ib yaam le lwm chaav hab. Xalumoos tseem ua dlua ib lub tsev zoo ib yaam le lub ntawd rua nwg tug quaspuj kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tug ntxhais nyob hab.

Taagnrho tej chaav tsev ntawd, hab chaav luj kws tu plaub ntug puavleej muab tej txag zeb xov huv taw ntsaa moog nto plawg rua sau hauvmuag tsev. Cov pobzeb ntawd, luas yeej ntsuag hum hab txav tom chaw khawb pobzeb lawm, luas muab kaw kaw saab huv hab saab nrau huv tuabsi.
Tej plaag tsev los yog muab tej dlaim txag zeb dlaav heev kws txaug tom chaw khawb pobzeb lug pua, muaj tej dlaim ntev yim tshim hab muaj tej dlaim ntev kaum tshim.
Luas tseem muab dlua ib cov txag zeb kws ntsuag txav tau hum lawm hab ib cov txag ntoo thuv kws zoo heev lug pua tshooj rua sau cov plaag tsev ntawd.
Chaav huv lub loog, chaav huv plawv lub Tuamtsev, hab chaav kws ua kev moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev cov phaab ntsaa ib txheej yog txag ntoo thuv hab peb txheej yog txag zeb.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tso tuabneeg moog hu ib tug txivneej npe hu ua Hulaas huv lub nroog Tiles tuaj cuag nwg. Hulaas yog ib tug kws nchuav tooj.

Hulaas txiv yog tuabneeg Tiles, nwg txiv tuag ntxuv lawm; Hulaas nam yog tuabneeg Nafetalis, Hulaas yog ib tug tuabneeg muaj tswvyim hab txawj nchuav tooj heev. Nwg tau leeg Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tej lug caw hab tuaj ua teg num nchuav tooj.
Hulaas nchuav tau ob tug ncej tooj zoo ib yaam nkaus, ib tug twg sab kaum yim tshim, hab qhov luj  yog kaum ob tshim.
Hab nwg tseem nchuav tau ob lub hau dlhos rua sau ob tug hauv ncej, ib lub hau twg sab tsib tshim.
Nwg nchuav ob txuj saw tooj dlai rua sau ob tug hauv ncej.
Hab muab tooj nchuav ua ob tshaam tswb zoo le txiv ntsab pobkws dlai rua sau hab.
Ob lub hau ntawd zoo ib yaam le tej paaj lilis, sab plaub tshim,
hab muab dlhos rua sau ob tug hauv ncej nrug ob txuj saw tooj. Ib tshaam tswb twg muaj ob puas lub dlai puagncig rua lub hau, hab ib tug ncej twg  dlai ob tshaam tswb.
Hulaas muab ob tug ncej tooj ntawd txhus rua ntawm hauv ntej kws yuav moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev: Tug ncej saab nraag hu ua Yakhees,  hab tug ncej saab peg hu ua Npau-am
Cov paaj tooj lilis ntawd muab dlai rua sau ob tug hauv ncej tooj. Ces teg num kws Hulaas nchuav ob tug ncej tooj tav le ntawd.
Hulaas muab tooj nchuav tau ib lub rhawv kheej kheej, sab tsib tshim, saab npoo nuav rua saab npoo tid muaj kaum tshim, hab lub cheeb muaj peb caug tshim.
Nwg muab tooj nchuav ua ob lub thi lug thi puagncig lub ncauj rhawv  saab nrau; ob lub thi ntawd nchuav nrug lub rhawv.
muab lub rhawv ntawd txawb rua sau kaum ob tug nyuj tooj kws tig taubhau rua saab nrau, peb tug nyuj twg tig taubhau rua ib saab.

Lub rhawv ntawd tug npoo tuab le peb nti thoob plawg, tug ntug zoo le tej npoo khob, nwg muab zaaj ntug nrau zaig txaij nraug zeeg nthuav zoo le lub paaj lilis. Lub rhawv ntawd, ntim tau kwvyees le ob txheeb thoob dlej.
Hulaas tseem nchuav tau kaum lub tsheb tooj; ib lub twg ntev plaub tshim, dlaav plaub tshim hab sab peb tshim.
Puab txua ib cov taab ua plaub faab ntsa rua

kws yog muab txaug ua tej dluab tsuv ntxhuav, tej dluab nyuj hab ua dluab qhelunpees rua sau cov txag ntawd; hab sau cov taab, cov txag kws has nuav, nyob sau hab huv qaab tej dluab tsuv ntxhuav, tej dluab nyuj, mas muab txaug ua qaabqwj txaij nraug zeeg rua.
Ib lub tsheb twg muaj plaub lub lug tooj hab ob tug nqaaj puavleej muaj ncej txheem plaub ceg kaum; cov ncej ntawd muab txaug ua qaabqwj txaij raug zeeg thoob plawg.
Sau lub ncauj rhawv ua lub kheej kheej. Txij ndlua ntawm lub npoo tsheb rua sau, sab ib tshim hab tog kws dlhos rua huv lub tsheb ntev ib dlus. Hab muab lub ncauj zaig thoob plawg.
Cov lug sab ib tshim hab ib dlus; hab cov lug ntawd puavleej nyob huv qaab cov txag. Hab cov nqaaj yeej muab ntsa rua cov tsheb ua ke le lawm.
Cov lug zoo ib yaam le tej lug tsheb neeg; cov nqaaj, cov thi, cov kauj hab cov khwb lug, puavleej yog muab tooj nchuav ua.
Ib lub tsheb twg muaj plaub tug ncej txheem huv qaab plaub ceg kaum tuaj kws yog muab ntsa rua ntawm lub tsheb.
Txhua lub tsheb, muaj ib tug ntug nkhaus quas vog ncig thoob plawg sab ib dlus; cov ntug hab cov txag puavleej muab ntsa rua ntawm lub tsheb.
Cov ncej hab cov txag muab txaug ua dluab qhelunpees, dluab tsuv ntxhuav, dluab toovlaaj rua txhua qhov kws seem chaw, hab muab txaug txaij raug zeeg thoob plawg.
Tej kws has taag nuav yog has txug qhov kws ua cov tsheb ntawd zoo le caag; cov tsheb nuav nchuav zoo ib yaam, luj sis luag hab sab sis txig.
Hulaas tseem nchuav dlua kaum lub rhawv tooj, ib lub rhawv rua ib lub tsheb. Ib lub rhawv twg lub nrog muaj plaub tshim hab ntim tau tsib caug thoob dlej.

Nwg muab tsib lub coj moog teeb rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab qaabteb, hab muab tsib lub coj moog teeb rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab qaumteb; lub rhawv tooj luj muab teeb rua tom ceg kaum saab nubtuaj qaabteb.

Hulaas tseem nchuav tau ib cov laujkaub, ib cov dluav, hab taig phab. Nwg teg num kws nwg ua rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos huv lub Tuamtsev tav taag lawm. Tej nuav yog nwg ua: 1 ob tug ncej tooj, ob lub hau kws dlhos rua sau ob tug ncej. Cov saw kws dlai rua sau ob lub hau ncej Plaub puas lub tswb kws dlai rua ob txuj saw, ib tshaam muaj ib puas lub dlai rua sau ob lub hau ncej kaum lub tsheb tooj kaum lub rhawv tooj ib lub rhawv tooj luj kaum ob tug nyuj tooj txheem lub rhawv Cov laujkaub. Cov dluav hab Cov taig phab. Taagnrho tej cuabyeej kws siv rua huv lub Tuamtsev nuav, puavleej yog Hulaas ua rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tau siv huv lub Tuamtsev, txhua yaam yog tooj dlaag kws muab txhuam ci dlaaj nrhuv xwb.
Vaajntxwv ua tej nuav huv lub Haav Yauladees kws nyob ntu nruab nraab ntawm Xukaus hab Xalethaas.
Xalumoos tsi tau muab tej cuabyeej nuav luj saib nyaav pistsawg, rua qhov ntau dlhau lawm. Yog le ntawd, cov tooj kws muab ua tej cuabyeej ntawd nyaav npaum le caag los tsi muaj leejtwg paub le.
Xalumoos tseem muaj ib cov rooj tog kub rua huv lub Tuamtsev le nraag qaab nuav: Lub thaaj, lub rooj rau ncuav fij rua tug TSWV,
Kaum tug ncej teeb kws txawb rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus hauv ntej, tsib lub txawb rua saab peg hab tsib lub txawb rua saab nraag; tej paaj, tej teeb hab tej caj,

tej khob, tej txab txav teebxeeb, tej ntim, tej taig rau tshuaj tsw qaab, hab cov laujkaub rau ncaig tawg; hab cov ntsa laag qhovrooj rua Chaav Dlawbhuv, hab rua chaav saab nrau lub Tuamtsev nuav. Taagnrho tej khoom siv nuav puavleej yog muab kub nchuav xwb.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Xalumoos ua lub Tuamtsev txhua yaam tav taag lawm, nwg muab taagnrho tej nyaj, tej kub hab tej khoom kws nwg txiv Daviv muab fij rua Vaajtswv lawm, coj moog ca rua huv tej chaav rau khoom huv lub Tuamtsev.

Tom qaab ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xalumoos hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees txhua tug thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem hab txhua cuab kwvtij tuaj cuag nwg rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuas puab moog kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg huv lub nroog Xi-oos kws yog Daviv lub nroog, lug tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Puab tuaj sis sau rua thaus ua kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab kws yog lub hlis Ethanees.
Thaus cov thawjcoj tuaj txoos ua ke txhij lawm, cov povthawj txawm tsaws lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab kwv
lug rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Cov Levis hab cov povthawj muab tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab tej khoom siv kwv huv tuabsi lug ca rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos hab cov pejxeem tuaj sis sau ua ke rua ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab muab yaaj muab nyuj ntau kawg nkaus suav tsi txheeb lug tua fij rua tug TSWV.
Ces cov povthawj txhaj kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab muab tso rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus, huv qaab ob tug qhelunpees ob phob tis.
Ob tug qhelunpees ntawd, nthuav tis npug lub Phijxaab hab obtug laag ntoo kws kwv lub Phijxaab.

Yog leejtwg sawv ncaaj saab nraag Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg nkaus saib moog rua huv, nwg yeej pum ob tug tw laag, tabsis yog tuaj lwm qhov saib moog, yeej tsi pum le. (Naj nub nua ob tug laag ntoo ntawd tseem nyob.)

Yeej tsi muaj lwm yaam nyob huv lub Phijxaab ntawd, tsuas muaj ob dlaim txag zeb kws Mauxes muab ntim rua huv thaus nyob tom Roob Xinais; ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd yog sau Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg kws nwg sau rua cov Yixalayees, thaus puab taug kev nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Thaus cov povthawj tawm huv lub Tuamtsev lug, ces taamsim ntawd txawm ca le muaj ib tauv fuab lug roog tsaus nti sau lub Tuamtsev,
cov povthawj tsi muaj cuabkaav rov moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev le, rua qhov tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab rua huv Vaajtswv qhov chaw nyob.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos thov Vaajtswv le nuav: “Tug TSWV, koj yog tug kws tsim lub nub rua sau nruab ntug, txawm le ntawd los koj yeej pum zoo nyob huv tauv fuab kws tuab hab tsaus nti;
Nwgnuav kuv tub ua tau lub Tuamtsev kws zoo heev rua koj lawm, yog qhov chaw rua koj nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.”
Thaus cov pejxeem tseem sawv qhov ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tig xubndlag lug rua ntawm puab, hab nwg thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab.
Nwg has tas, “Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv! Nwg yeej ua lawv le tej kws nwg tau coglug tseg rua kuv txiv Daviv has tas,

‘Suav txij thaus kuv coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuv tsi tau xaiv ib lub nroog twg huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees txhua xeem lug ua lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pehawm kuv le. Tabsis Daviv, kuv tau xaiv koj lug ua tug kaav kuv tsaav tuabneeg.’ ”
Xalumoos has ntxiv tas, “Kuv txiv Daviv yeej npaaj yuav ua lub Tuamtsev kuas tau qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv,
tabsis tug TSWV has rua Daviv has tas, ‘Qhov kws koj xaav ua ib lub tuamtsev rua kuv ntawd, yeej yog ib qhov zoo heev,
tabsis koj tsi yog tug kws yuav ua lub Tuamtsev rua kuv. Koj tug tub kws koj yug yog tug kws yuav ua lub Tuamtsev rua kuv.’

“Nwgnuav tug TSWV tub ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg lawm. Kuv txhaj tau lug ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv hloov kuv txiv chaw, hab kuv tau lug ua lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv tseem tau ua ib qhov chaw rua huv lub Tuamtsev lug rau lub Phijxaab kws ntim ob dlaim txag zeb kws nwg sau nwg tej lug cog tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob thaus nwg coj puab nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.”
Xalumoos moog sawv taabmeeg cov pejxeem suavdlawg rua ntawm hauv ntej lub thaaj fij, nwg tsaa nwg ob txhais teg

hab thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug vaajtswv nyob sau ntuj lossis huv nplajteb nuav zoo le koj! Koj yeej ua lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg rua koj tsaav tuabneeg hab hlub puab thaus puab noog koj lug kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Koj tau ua lawv le tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua kuv txiv Daviv; mas nub nua muaj tav taag lawv le koj txhua lu lug lawm tag.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, nwgnuav kuv thov kuas koj ua lawv le lwm lu lug kws koj tau cog tseg rua kuv txiv has tas, koj yuav ca nwg cov xeebntxwv ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees moog le, yog puab ua tuab zoo noog koj tej lug ib yaam le nwg noog koj tej lug.
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, thov kuas txhua yaam muaj tseeb lawv le tej lug kws koj tau cog tseg rua kuv txiv Daviv kws yog koj tug tubkhai lawm!”
“Tabsis Vaajtswv, koj yuav ua le caag nyob huv nplajteb nuav? Lub ntuj luj hab dlaav npaum le ntawd, tub tsi txaus koj nyob. Yog le ntawd, lub Tuamtsev kws kuv ua nuav yuav ua caag txaus koj nyob?
Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yog koj tug tubkhai. Thov koj noog hab teb kuv tej lug kws nub nua kuv thov koj.

Thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib lub Tuamtsev nuav nruab nub mo ntuj. Qhov nuav yog qhov chaw kws koj xaiv lug rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm koj. Thaus kuv tig xubndlag tuaj rua lub Tuamtsev nuav thov koj, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov.
Thaus kuv hab koj tsaav tuabneeg tig xubndlag tuaj rua ntawm qhov chaw nuav thov koj, koj nyob huv koj lub tsev sau ntuj noog peb tej lug thov hab zaam txim rua peb.

“Thaus muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg raug lam has tas nwg ua txhum rua tej kwvtij zej zog, hab coj nwg tuaj tsaa teg twv ntawm koj lub thaaj fij huv lub Tuamtsev nuav has tas nwg yeej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tag,
tug TSWV, koj yog tug nyob sau ntuj, thov koj noog hab txav txim rua koj ob tug tubkhai. Ca le rau txim rua tug kws ua txhum lawv le nwg tau ua, hab thov koj tso tug kws tsi muaj txim.

“Thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees swb puab tej yeebncuab, vim puab tau ua txhum rua koj; tabsis yog puab tig rov lug cuag koj hab puab tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev nuav, leeg puab tej kev txhum thov koj zaam txim,
koj nyob sau ntuj, thov koj noog puab tej lug thov. Thov zaam txim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg tej kev txhum hab coj puab rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws koj tub muab pub rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.
“Thaus koj tsi tso naag lug, vim koj tsaav tuabneeg tau ua txhum rua koj, tabsis yog puab leeg txim hab tig xubndlag tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev nuav thov koj,

thaus ntawd thov koj tug kws nyob sau ntuj noog puab tej lug thov. Thov koj zaam txim rua vaajntxwv hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees, hab qha puab kuas paub ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg, ces tug TSWV, thov koj tso naag lug rua lub tebchaws kws koj tau muab pub rua koj tsaav tuabneeg ua puab tug moog le lawm.

“Yog lub tebchaws muaj kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis muaj kaab mob kis lossis tej qoobloo raug puamtsuaj vim muaj cua dlaaj cua dlub nplawm lossis muaj kooj txomfaav noj lossis thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg raug puab cov yeebncuab tawmtsaam lossis thaus puab raug mob lossis muaj mob muaj nkeeg,
thov koj noog puab tej lug thov. Yog koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees leejtwg muaj kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv, hab tsaa teg tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev nuav thov koj,

thov koj noog puab tej lug thov. Thov koj teb puab tej lug thov ntawm koj lub chaw nyob sau ntuj tuaj, thov koj zaam txim rua puab hab paab puab. Tsuas yog koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj paub txug tuabneeg lub sab xaav. Thov koj ua rua txhua tug lawv le nwg teg num,
mas koj tsaav tuabneeg txhaj le yuav fwm koj moog taag puab tam neej nyob huv lub tebchaws kws koj muab pub rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.
“Thaus ib tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob dleb, nov txug koj lub koob meej hab tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj tau ua paab koj tsaav tuabneeg dlhau lug lawm tuaj thov koj huv lub Tuamtsev nuav,

thov koj noog nwg tej lug thov. Koj nyob sau ntuj kws yog koj qhov chaw nyob, thov koj noog nwg hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug thov, kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav txhaj yuav paub koj hab noog koj lug, ib yaam le koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees noog koj lug. Ces puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv ua lub Tuamtsev nuav lug ua qhov chaw pehawm koj.

“Thaus koj has kuas koj tsaav tuabneeg moog tua puab cov yeebncuab, txawm yog puab nyob qhov twg thov koj los tsuav yog puab tig xubndlag tuaj rua huv lub nroog kws koj xaiv tseg hab lub Tuamtsev kws kuv ua rua koj nuav lawm,
koj nyob sau ntuj, thov koj noog puab tej lug thov hab paab kuas puab muaj yeej.

“Tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg kws tsi tau ua txhum le, yog thaus twg koj tsaav tuabneeg ua txhum rua koj, koj chim rua puab hab ca puab cov yeebncuab tua yeej puab hab nteg puab coj moog rua lwm lub tebchaws. Txawm yog lub tebchaws ntawd nyob dleb hab ze

los thov koj noog koj tsaav tuabneeg tej lug thov. Yog puab nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, leeg puab tej kev txhum hab tej kev phem kev qas kws puab tau ua lug lawm, tug TSWV, thov koj noog puab tej lug thov.

Nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, yog puab rov lug muab sab npuab koj tag tag, leeg puab tej kev txhum hab tig xubndlag tuaj rua huv lub tebchaws kws koj muab pub rua peb cov yawmkoob, lub nroog kws koj xaiv tseg hab lub Tuamtsev kws kuv ua rua koj lawm,
thov koj noog puab tej lug thov. Koj nyob ntawm koj lub chaw sau ntuj noog puab thov hab hlub puab,
zaam puab tej kev txhum kws puab ntxeev sab rua koj, hab tshoov puab cov yeebncuab sab kuas ua lub sab zoo rua puab.
Puab yog koj tsaav tuabneeg kws koj coj tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv qhov kws zoo ib yaam le lub cubtawg kws cig tsi paub tuag le lug.

“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov koj naj nub tsaa qhovmuag saib hab hlub koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hab puab tug vaajntxwv. Thaus twg puab tsaa ncauj thov koj paab puab, thov koj noog puab tej lug thov.

Rua qhov koj yeej xaiv puab tawm ntawm txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav lug ua koj tsaav tuabneeg, ib yaam le koj tau has rua koj tug tubkhai Mauxes thaus koj coj peb cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.”
Tom qaab kws Xalumoos thov tug TSWV taag lawm, nwg txawm sawv ntawm lub thaaj hauv ntej, qhov chaw kws nwg txhus caug hab tsaa teg rua sau ntuj.
Nwg tsaa ncauj thov Vaajtswv nrov nrov foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem kws tuaj sis sau rua ntawd has tas,

“Ua tug TSWV tsaug, nwg yog tug kws pub nwg tsaav tuabneeg tau nyob kaaj sab lug, ib yaam le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm. Nwg yeej ua lawv le txhua yaam lug cog tseg kws nwg kuas nwg tug tubkhai Mauxes qha rua peb lawm.
Thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv nrug peb nyob ib yaam le nwg nrug peb cov yawmkoob nyob; thov nwg tsi xob tso peb tseg;

thov tug TSWV tshoov peb sab kuas peb noog nwg lug, peb txhaj yuav ua tau peb lub neej hum nwg sab hab coj tau lawv le nwg tej kevcai, hab nwg tej lug saamfwm kws nwg tau qha tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.

Thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv thov txhua zag. Thov nwg taabncuab nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hab puab tug vaajntxwv, lawv le tej kws puab naj nub xaav yuav xaav tau.
Kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav paub has tas, tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv, yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov twg le lawm.
Thov mej cov kws yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg, ca le muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, hab coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai, hab nwg tej lug saamfwm ib yaam le mej ua naj nub nua.”
Ces Vaajntxwv Xalumoos hab cov pejxeem txawm muab tsaj tua fij rua tug TSWV.
Nwg muab neeg nkaum ob txheeb tug nyuj, hab ib puas neeg nkaum txheeb tug yaaj tua fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Yog le ntawd, vaajntxwv hab cov pejxeem txhaj le muab lub Tuamtsev fij rua Vaajtswv.

Nub ntawd, Vaajntxwv muab thaaj aav huv plawv lub tshaav puam kws nyob ntawm lub Tuamtsev hauv ntej ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv, muab tej tsaj tua hlawv fij taagnrho, muab tej qoobloo fij hab muab tej paavywj tsaj hlawv fij rua Vaajtswv ua kev sis raug zoo. Nwg ua le ntawd, rua qhov lub thaaj tooj miv heev tsi txaus hlawv tej khoom fij ntawd.

Vaajntxwv Xalumoos hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees ua kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab hab noj haus rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev tau xyaa  nub. Tej tuabneeg tuaj coob kawg le, tuaj peg lub dlawm Hamas hab nraag nrimteb Iziv tuaj huv tuabsi.

Nub yim Xalumoos maam tso puab rov moog vaaj moog tsev. Puab txhua tug puavleej ua nwg tsaug hab zoo sab hlo moog tsev, vim tej koob moov kws tug TSWV pub rua nwg tug tubkhai Daviv hab rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.
Tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Xalumoos ua tau lub Tuamtsev, ua tau lub loog hab ua txhua yaam kws nwg npaaj sab ua tav taag lawm,
tug TSWV rov lug rua Xalumoos pum dlua ib zag ib yaam le nwg tau lug rua Xalumoos pum nyob huv lub nroog Nkinpe-oos hab.
Tug TSWV has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Kuv nov koj tej lug thov lawm, kuv muab lub Tuamtsev kws koj ua tau lawm, ua qhov chaw tseemceeb rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm kuv moog ibtxhis.
Yog koj pehawm kuv ntawm lub sab ncaaj nceeg hab ua sab dlawb sab zoo ib yaam le koj txiv Daviv ua, hab yog koj noog kuv tej lug hab ua txhua yaam lawv le kuv tub saamfwm rua koj lawm,
kuv yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua koj txiv Daviv thaus kws kuv has rua nwg tas, nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua cov tswjfwm cov Yixalayees moog ibtxhis le.
Tabsis yog koj lossis koj cov xeebntxwv tso kuv tseg, tsi ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kws kuv muab rua koj nuav, hab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv,

kuv yuav muab kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab lawm. Kuv yuav muab lub Tuamtsev kws kuv leeg yuav ua qhov chaw tseemceeb rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm kuv ntawd tso povtseg. Tej tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov yuav luag cov Yixalayees plig hab saib lub Tuamtsev tsi muaj nqes.

Lub Tuamtsev nuav yuav raug puamtsuaj ua ib pawg  hab ua rua txhua tug kws dlua kev pum yuav poob sab hab xaav tsi thoob. Puab yuav nug has tas, ‘Vim le caag tug TSWV txhaj ua le ntawd rua lub tebchaws hab lub Tuamtsev nuav?’

Luas tej yuav teb has tas, ‘Tub yog vim puab muab tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv, tug kws coj puab cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug tso povtseg lawm. Puab muab sab npuab luas tej vaajtswv hab moog pe tej vaajtswv ntawd. Tub yog vim le nuav tug TSWV txhaj tso tej kev puamtsuaj nuav lug raug puab.’ ”
Xalumoos siv sijhawm neeg nkaum xyoo ua lub Tuamtsev hab nwg lub loog.

Vaajntxwv Hilaas kws kaav lub nroog Tiles, tau muab ntoo thuv, ntoo cab hab kub tuaj pub rua Xalumoos lawv le nwg xaav tau lug ua nwg tej num. Tom qaab kws tej num tav taag lawm, Vaajntxwv Xalumoos txhaj le muab tau neeg nkaum lub nroog kws nyob huv lub xeev Kalilais rua Hilaas.
Tabsis thaus Hilaas tuaj huv lub nroog Tiles tuaj saib, nwg tsi nyam cov nroog ntawd.

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Tug kwv, tej nroog kws koj muab rua kuv zoo le nuav xwb!” Tub yog vim le nuav txhaj muab thaaj chaw ntawd tis npe hu ua Kanpus  lug txug naj nub nua.
Cov kub kws Hilaas xaa tuaj pub rua Xalumoos ntawd, yuav laug muaj tsib taas.

Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tsaa ib cov tub zug lug ua lub Tuamtsev hab nwg lub loog, ua lub tsev Milus hab ua lub nroog Yeluxalees tug ntsaa yeej. Dlua le ntawd, nwg tseem siv cov tub zug ntawd moog khu lub nroog Haxaus, Menkidaus hab Nkexes.

(Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tau tuaj tua hab txeeb tau lub nroog Nkexes, nwg txhaj muab cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv tua tuag taag hab muab lub nroog hlawv kub nyab taag huv tuabsi lawm. Ces nwg txawm muab lub nroog ntawd pub rua nwg tug ntxhais kws yuav Xalumoos,
hab Xalumoos rov muab lub nroog ntawd khu dlua tshab.) Xalumoos tseem siv nwg paab tub zug ntawd rov moog ua lub nroog Npethes Hauloos Theem Qeg,
Npa-alas hab Tamaj kws nyob tom nraag mojsaab qhua huv lub xeev Yudas,

tej nroog kws nwg tso nwg tej cuabyeej, tej nroog kws nwg kaw nwg tej neeg hab ca tej tsheb neeg, txhua yaam kws nwg ua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, peg Roob Lenpanoos hab lwm qhov chaw kws nyob huv nwg lub tebchaws.

Xalumoos cov tub zug ua num, mas yog cov Kana-aas tej xeebntxwv kws cov Yixalayees tsi muab tua thaus puab nteg tau coj lug rua huv cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws. Cov nuav xaam taagnrho cov Amaules, cov Hitis, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus, puab tej xeebntxwv tseem ua qhev lug txug naj nub nua.
Xalumoos tsi muab cov Yixalayees ua qhev; puab tsuas ua nwg cov tubrog, cov numtswv, cov thawj tubrog, cov tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg hab cov tubrog caij neeg xwb.
Xalumoos tsaa tsib puas tsib caug leej ua cov thawj saib cov tuabneeg kws ua nwg tej vaaj tse.

Xalumoos coj nwg tug quaspuj kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tug ntxhais, huv Daviv lub nroog lug nyob rua huv lub tsev kws Xalumoos ua rua nwg tug quaspuj ntawd nyob lawm. Tom qaab ntawd Xalumoos maam ua lub tsev Milus ntxiv.

Xalumoos muab khoom hlawv fij hab muab tej khoom fij ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV sau lub thaaj kws nwg ua rua tug TSWV ib xyoos twg peb zag. Nwg tseem muab tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab  coj moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV hab. Ces qhov kws nwg ua lub Tuamtsev tav le ntawd.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tseem ua tau ib cov nkoj rua huv Exi-oosnkenpes kws nyob ntawm ntug Havtxwv Lab ze rua ntawm Elathas huv tebchaws Edoos.
Vaajntxwv Hilaas tau xaa nwg ib cov tuabneeg kws txawj tsaav nkoj tuaj ua num nrug Xalumoos cov tuabneeg tsaav cov nkoj ntawd.
Puab txhaj tsaav cov nkoj ntawd moog rua tim tebchaws Aufiles, hab thauj tau yuav laug kaum rau taas kub lug rua Xalumoos.

Xalumoos lub koob meej nrov nchaa moo lug  moog txug rua cov Senpas tug puj vaajntxwv, nwg txhaj le tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg nug ntau zaaj kws tsi yoojyim totaub, sim saib Xalumoos puas teb tau.

Nwg coj tuabneeg coob heev nrug nwg tuaj, nwg muab ntxhuav thauj tej txumlom tsw qaab, tej hlaws muaj nqes hab kub ntau kawg le tuaj. Thaus nwg hab Xalumoos sis ntsib lawm, nwg nug Xalumoos ntau tsaav ntau yaam, taagnrho tej tswvyim kws nwg npaaj tuaj nug.
Xalumoos teb tau nwg tej lug nug ntawd huv tuabsi, tsi muaj ib lus twg nyuaj kws Xalumoos teb tsi tau le.
Thaus cov Senpas tug puj vaajntxwv nov Xalumoos tej tswvyim hab pum lub loog kws Xalumoos ua,

nwg pum tej zaub mov kws luas rau rua sau Xalumoos lub rooj, tej tsev kws nwg cov numtswv nyob, tej tub kaavxwm los yeej nyob muaj chaw hab tej tsoog tsho kws puab naav los zoo ib yaam nkaus, tej tub laub dlej laub cawv, hab tej tsaj kws tua fij huv lub Tuamtsev, ua rua puj vaajntxwv yoob hab xaav tsi thoob le.
Nwg has rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos has tas, “Txhua yaam kws kuv nov has txug koj hab koj tej tswvyim yeej muaj tseeb lawv le tej kws kuv tau nov thaus kuv tseem nyob nraag kuv lub tebchaws.
Tabsis kuv tsi ntseeg tej ntawd txug thaus kws kuv tuaj pum koj kag lawm. Koj tej tswvyim hab kev npluanuj tseem ntau tshaaj tej kws luas pav qha kuv. Muaj ib nraab kuv yeej tsi tau nov hlo le.
Ua le caag koj cov quaspuj  yuav muaj moo ua luaj! Hab koj cov tubqhe los muaj moo kawg le, puab naj nub nrug koj nyob hab nov tej lug txawj ntse kws koj has.

Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv! Nwg ua rua suavdlawg pum has tas, nwg txaus sab heev rua koj, nwg txhaj tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees. Vim nwg txujkev hlub cov Yixalayees nyob moog ibtxhis le. Nwg txhaj tsaa koj ua puab tug vaajntxwv, coj puab ua lawv le nwg txuj kevcai hab txujkev ncaaj nceeg.”

Puj vaajntxwv txhaj muab tej khoom kws nwg thauj tuaj pub rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos: kub yuav laug muaj tsib taas, txumlom hab hlaws ntau kawg le. Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tsi tau pum dlua leejtwg muab txumlom tuaj pub rua nwg ntau npaum le tej kws cov Senpas tug puj vaajntxwv coj tuaj pub rua nwg ntawd le.
(Dlua le ntawd Hilaas tseem muab nwg lub nkoj thauj kub, thauj ntoo thwjsuab hab thauj hlaws ntau heev nraag tebchaws Aufiles tuaj pub rua Xalumoos hab.

Xalumoos muab cov ntoo nuav ua ncej rua lub Tuamtsev, ua ncej rua vaajntxwv lub loog hab muab txua ua raaj hab nkauj nogncaas rua cov ntaus suab nkauj siv. Yeej tsi tau muaj dlua lwm lub tebchaws xaa tej tseem ntoo le cov nuav tuaj rua huv tebchaws Yixalayees hlo le; hom ntoo nuav yeej tsi pum muaj ntxiv le lawm.)

Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muab txhua yaam kws cov Senpas tug puj vaajntxwv thov pub rua nwg. Dlua le ntawd Xalumoos tseem muab ntau yaam pub rua puj vaajntxwv hab, ces puj vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txawm rov moog rua nraag tebchaws Senpas lawm.
Txhua lub xyoo twg Vaajntxwv Xalumoos yeej tau txais kub txug le neeg nkaum tsib taas,
ntxiv rua tej se  kws cov tub laag tub luam them tuaj, tej paajlaum kws tau lug ntawm sis pauv kev laag luam, hab tej kws cov Alav cov vaajntxwv hab cov Yixalayees tej tswvxeev coj tuaj rua nwg.
Xalumoos muab cov kub ntawd ntaus tau ob puas dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, ib dlaim twg nyaav kwvlaam le kaum tsib choj.
Hab nwg ntaus tau peb puas dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, ib dlaim twg nyaav yuav laug plaub choj. Nwg muab taagnrho cov thaiv nav ntaaj ntawd coj moog ca rua huv Chaav Tsev Haav Zoov Lenpanoos.
Vaajntxwv tseem ua tau ib lub zwmtxwv luj. Lub zwmtxwv ntawd yog muab kaug ntxhw ua hab muab kub vuam thoob plawg rua.

Muaj rau theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub zwmtxwv ntawd. Rau theem qeb ntai ntawd, ib theem twg luas puab ob tug tsuv ntxhuav txawb rua ob tog, taagnrho yog muaj kaum ob tug. Tom qaab lub zwmtxwv txua ua ib lub taubhau nyuj, hab txua ob tug tsuv ntxhuav sawv rua ob saab ua ob tug tag npaab. Nyob rua lwm lub tebchaws yeej tsi muaj ib lub zwmtxwv zoo npaum le lub nuav.

Taagnrho Xalumoos tej khob haus dlej puavleej yog muab kub ua, hab tej twj taig siv huv Chaav Tsev Haav Zoov Lenpanoos puavleej yog muab kub nchuav ua. Tej nyaj yeej tsi tau muab lug siv le, rua qhov tam kws Xalumoos nyob ntawd, luas suav has tas nyaj tsi muaj nqes.

Xalumoos tseem muaj ntau lub nkoj kws yog tej nkoj thauj khoom huv havtxwv nrug Hilaas cov nkoj. Txhua peb lub xyoos twg luas siv cov nkoj ntawd moog thauj kub, nyaj, kaug ntxhw, lab hab yaaj yuam  lug rua nwg.
Vaajntxwv Xalumoos yog tug kws npluanuj hab ntse tshaaj tej vaajntxwv huv tuabsi.
Tej tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb xaav tuaj noog nwg pav nwg tej tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse kws Vaajtswv pub rua nwg.
Txhua tug kws tuaj puavleej coj nyaj, kub, tsho ntev, cuabyeej ua rog, txumlom, neeg hab neeg zaag tuaj pub rua Xalumoos. Pheej muaj le nuav ib xyoos dlhau rua ib xyoos.

Xalumoos tseem ua tau ib txheeb plaub puas lub tsheb neeg ua rog hab muaj kaum ob txheeb leej tubrog caij neeg. Muaj ibtxha nwg ca nyob huv Yeluxalees, hab dlua le cov nwg coj moog rua lwm lub nroog lawm.

Lub sijhawm kws Xalumoos ua tug kaav tebchaws ntawd, nwg saib nwg tej nyaj tsuas zoo le tej pobzeb huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab tej ntoo cab los zoo le tej ntoo xikamaus kws tuaj ntawm tej taw roob huv tebchaws Yudas xwb.
Vaajntxwv tseem muaj cov sawv cev txais tej neeg kws luas caab huv lub tebchaws Muxilis  hab Kilikias  tuaj,

hab cov tsheb neeg yog coj nraag tebchaws Iziv tuaj. Puab xaa tej neeg hab cov tsheb neeg ntawd moog muag rua cov Hitis hab cov Xilias ob tug vaajntxwv, cov tsheb neeg muag ib lub rau pua dlaim nyaj, hab cov neeg muag ib tug ib puas tsib caug dlaim nyaj.

Xalumoos nyam ntau tug quaspuj kws yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws. Dlua le cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tug ntxhais lawm, nwg tseem yuav cov Hitis, cov Mau-am, cov Edoos hab cov Xidoos tej ntxhais lug ua quaspuj hab.
Xalumoos tseem moog yuav cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV txwv kuas cov Yixalayees tsi xob yuav tej ntxhais lug ua quaspuj, rua qhov puab yuav coj cov Yixalayees moog pe puab tej vaajtswv.
Xalumoos yuav xyaa pua tug quaspuj kws yog ntxhais vaajntxwv hab peb puas tug kws tsi yog ntxhais vaajntxwv, cov quaspuj ntawd txhaj ua rua nwg tso Vaajtswv tseg,
hab thaus kws nwg laug lawm, nwg cov quaspuj ntawd txhaj coj nwg moog pe cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv. Nwg tsi muab lub sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv le nwg txiv Daviv lawm.
Nwg moog pe cov Xidoos tug vaajtswv Atates, hab moog pe cov Amoos tug vaajtswv Maulej kws phem qas kawg le.
Nwg tau ua txhum rua tug TSWV, hab tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV lub sab nyam le nwg txiv Daviv ua.
Nyob rua sau lub roob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees saab nubtuaj, Xalumoos ua tau ib lub chaw pe cov Mau-am tug vaajtswv Khemaus, hab ib lub chaw pe cov Amoos tug vaajtswv Maulej.
Hab nwg tseem ua ntau lub chaw rua nwg cov quaspuj kws yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, tau hlawv xyaab hab hlawv khoom fij rua puab tej vaajtswv.

Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, tau lug rua Xalumoos pum ob zag, hab has kuas nwg tsi xob moog pe cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv hlo le. Txawm le ntawd los Xalumoos tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug, nwg tau tso tug TSWV tseg, yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj chim heev rua Xalumoos

hab has rua Xalumoos has tas, “Vim koj rhuav tej lug kws koj cog tseg nrug kuv lawm, hab koj tsi noog kuv tej lug, kuv has rua koj has tas, kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws tshem tawm ntawm koj moog, hab muab rua koj cov numtswv ib tug kaav.
Tabsis vim kuv tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg rua koj txiv Daviv lawm, kuv yuav tsi muab tshem tawm thaus koj tseem ua neej nyob, yuav yog tam kws koj tug tub ua tug kaav, kuv maam le tshem.

Hab kuv yuav tsi tshem lub tebchaws kuas taag ntawm nwg moog, vim kuv tau coglug tseg rua kuv tug tubkhai Daviv hab lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yog lub nroog kuv xaiv ca ua kuv tug, kuv yuav tseg ib xeem rua nwg kaav xwb.”
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj tshoov Hadas kws yog ib tug ntawm cov Edoos tug vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg sab, kuas ntxeev sab tawmtsaam Xalumoos.

Ua ntej ntau xyoo lug lawm, thaus Daviv moog ntaus lub tebchaws Edoos, nwg tug thawj tubrog Yau-am tau moog log cov tuabneeg sis tua tuag. Yau-am hab nwg cov tubrog nyob huv tebchaws Edoos tau rau lub hlis, lub sijhawm ntawd puab muab txhua tug txivneej huv tebchaws Edoos tua tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm,
tsuas tshuav Hadas hab nwg txiv cov tubkhai kws yog tuabneeg Edoos leej puav kws tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv txhaj dlim xwb. (Thaus ntawd Hadas tseem yog mivnyuas yau).

Puab tsiv tawm huv Midias moog rua huv Palaas, txawm muaj qee leej txivneej nyob huv koom nrug puab, ces puab txawm moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv hab moog cuag Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv, nwg txhaj tu lub tebchaws hab muab ib lub tsev rua Hadas nyob hab pub zaub mov rua Hadas noj.
Hadas yog Falaus ib tug phoojywg zoo heev, Falaus txhaj muab nwg tug quaspuj kws npe hu ua Tanpenes tug nam hluas rua Hadas yuav ua quaspuj.
Hadas tug quaspuj yug tau ib tug tub rua Hadas, nwg tis npe hu ua Nkenunpas, nam vaajntxwv Falaus coj tug tub ntawd moog tu huv lub loog, hab nwg yeej nrug vaajntxwv cov tub luj hlub ua ke.

Thaus Hadas tseem nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, nwg nov xuv has tas, Daviv tuag lawm hab Yau-am kws yog tug thawj tubrog los tuag lawm, Hadas txhaj has rua Falaus has tas, “Thov ca kuv rov qaab moog peg kuv lub tebchaws.”

Falaus teb has tas, “Puas yog tseem tshuav tej yaam kws kuv muab tsi txaus rua koj, koj txhaj xaav rov moog peg koj lub tebchaws?” Hadas teb has tas, “Tsi yog, thov ca le tso kuv rov moog xwb.”. Ces nwg txawm rov lug rua peg nwg lub tebchaws lawm. Cov Edoos tug vaajntxwv Hadas, yog cov Yixalayees  ib tug yeebncuab kws phem hab nruj tsiv heev.
Vaajtswv tseem tshoov Eli-adas tug tub Lexoos sab, kuas ntxeev sab tawmtsaam Xalumoos hab. Lexoos yog tug kws tsiv tawm ntawm nwg tug tswv kws yog cov Xaunpas tug Vaajntxwv Hadadexes,

hab moog ua ib tug thawj tubsaab kws ua txhum kevcai luj kawg le. (Qhov nuav tshwmsim tom qaab kws Daviv moog tua yeej Hadadexes hab muab cov Xilias kws koom teg nrug nwg tua tuag taag lawm). Ces Lexoos hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj tsiv moog nyob peg Damaxes, Lexoos cov tuabneeg txhaj muab Lexoos tsaa ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Xilias.
Lexoos yog cov Yixalayees ib tug yeebncuab nyob rua Xalumoos tam.

Muaj dlua ib tug txivneej tig rov tawmtsaam Vaajntxwv Xalumoos. Tug ntawd yog Xalumoos ib tug numtswv ntaag, nwg yog Nenpas tug tub Yelaunpau-aas kws nyob huv lub nroog Xeledas peg lub xeev Efalayees. Yelaunpau-aas nam hu ua Xeluas hab yog ib tug puj ntsuag.
Qhov kws Yelaunpau-aas ntxeev sab rua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos, vim Xalumoos ua lub Tsev Milus hab khu tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv nwg txiv Daviv lub nroog.

Yelaunpau-aas yog ib tug tub hluas kws muaj zug khov kho, thaus Xalumoos pum has tas Yelaunpau-aas yog ib tug kws mob sab ua num heev, Xalumoos txhaj tsaa nwg ua tug saib taagnrho cov tub zug kws nyob huv lub xeev Manaxes hab lub xeev Efalayees.
Muaj ib nub, thaus Yelaunpau-aas taabtom taug kev nraag Yeluxalees lug, Ahiyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug huv lub nroog Silaus tuaj ntsib Yelaunpau-aas tom ib tog kev ntawm roob mojsaab.
Ahiyas hle hlo nwg lub tsho tshab luj lug dlua rhe ua kaum ob dlaim,

hab has rua Yelaunpau-aas tas, “Koj ca le nqaa kaum dlaim moog rua koj, vim tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has rua koj tas, ‘Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws tshem tawm ntawm Xalumoos moog, hab kuv yuav muab kaum xeem rua koj kaav.
Tsuas pub Xalumoos kaav ib xeem lawm xwb, rua qhov kuv tseem hlub kuv tug tubkhai Daviv hab lub nroog Yeluxalees, lub nroog nuav kuv tau xaiv huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees lug ua kuv tug lawm.

Kuv ua le nuav tub yog vim Xalumoos tso kuv tseg hab moog  pe cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv: cov Xidoos tug vaajtswv kws yog tug mlom quaspuj Atates; cov Mau-am tug vaajtswv Khemaus, hab cov Amoos tug vaajtswv Maulej. Xalumoos tsi noog kuv lug; Xalumoos tau  ua txhum tsi ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab kuv tej lug saamfwm le nwg txiv Daviv noog kuv lug hab coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai.

Tabsis kuv yuav tsi muab lub tebchaws tshem taagnrho ntawm Xalumoos moog, rua qhov kuv tseem yuav ca nwg muaj fwjchim kaav moog kuas taag nwg tam. Kuv ua le nuav tub yog kuv hlub kuv tug tubkhai Daviv, nwg yog tug kws kuv xaiv hab yog tug kws ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm.
Kuv yuav tshem lub tebchaws ntawm Xalumoos tug tub moog, hab kuv yuav muab kaum xeem rua koj,

tabsis kuv yuav tseg ib xeem rua Xalumoos tug tub kaav, kuv yuav ca kuv tug tubkhai Daviv cov xeebntxwv kaav huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yog lub nroog kuv xaiv lug ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg pehawm kuv.
Yelaunpau-aas, kuv yuav tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees, koj yuav tau kaav taagnrho tej cheebtsaam aav kws koj xaav kaav.

Yog koj noog kuv tej lug txhua lu, coj koj lub neej lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm kws kuv muab rua koj, ib yaam le kuv tug tubkhai Daviv tau ua lug lawm, kuv yuav nrug nraim koj moog ibtxhis. Kuv yuav tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees hab yuav ca koj cov xeebntxwv ua vaajntxwv hloov koj chaw, ib yaam le kuv pub rua Daviv ntaag.
Vim Xalumoos tej kev txhum, kuv txhaj yuav rau txim rua Daviv cov xeebntxwv, tabsis tsi yog rau txim moog ibtxhis.’ ”
Yog le ntawd, Xalumoos txhaj pheej nrhav Yelaunpau-aas tua povtseg; tabsis nwg tsiv moog cuag cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv Sisas hab moog nyob nraag txug nub kws Xalumoos tuag.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Xalumoos ua, tsi has nwg teg num lossis nwg lub tswvyim kev txawj ntse, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo ntawv kws teev Xalumoos lub neej lawm.
Xalumoos ua vaajntxwv nyob huv Yeluxalees hab kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau plaub caug xyoo.
Xalumoos tuag luas coj nwg moog log rua huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Lehaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Lehaunpau-aas moog rua huv Sekhees, qhov chaw kws cov Yixalayees nyob saab Qaumteb tuaj txoos ua ke tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv.
Thaus Nenpas tug tub Yelaunpau-aas kws tsiv Vaajntxwv Xalumoos moog nkaum rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm, nov xuv txug zaaj nuav, nwg txhaj le rov  nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Taagnrho cov Xeem kws nyob saab Qaumteb tso tuabneeg moog hu Yelaunpau-aas tuaj, ces puab suavdlawg txawm ua ke moog cuag Lehaunpau-aas hab has rua nwg tas,
“Koj txiv Xalumoos ua nruj ua tsiv hab muab tej num nyaav heev rua peb ua. Yog koj txu kuas peb tau ua num sib, hab pub peb muaj kev kaaj sab, peb yuav txaus sab ua koj pejxeem moog le.”
Lehaunpau-aas teb has tas, “Peb nub sau nuav mej rov tuaj cuag kuv, kuv maam le teb mej.” Yog le ntawd, puab txawm rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas moog nrug cov laug kws ibtxwm yog nwg txiv Xalumoos cov tuavxaam saablaaj. Nwg nug puab has tas, “Mej yuav paab tswvyim rua kuv rov moog teb cov pejxeem le caag?”
Puab teb has tas, “Yog koj xaav kuas cov pejxeem poog koj, mas koj yuav tau teb kuas lawv le puab sab nyam, puab txhaj yuav ua koj cov pejxeem hab muab sab npuab koj moog le.”
Tabsis Lehaunpau-aas tsi yuav tej lug kws cov laug ntawd qha, nwg txawm moog nrug cov tuavxaam hluas kws nrug nwg ib phaum saablaaj.
Nwg nug puab has tas, “Mej paab kuv tuav tswvyim saib yuav teb le caag rua cov pejxeem kws tuaj thov kuv has tas, ‘Thov koj muab tej num nyaav kws koj txiv muab rua peb ua txu kuas sib mivntsiv?’ ”
Puab teb has tas, “Koj teb rua puab le nuav: ‘Kuv tug rwg teg tseem luj dlua kuv txiv lub dluav!’

Mej has tas, ‘Tej num kws kuv txiv muab rua mej ua nyaav heev; mas kuv tseem yuav muab tej num kws nyaav tshaaj ntawd rua mej ua hab. Nwg muab hlua tsaaj nplawm mej xwb; kuv yuav muab hlua tawv nplawm mej.’ ”
Peb nub tom qaab Yelaunpau-aas hab cov pejxeem rov tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas, lawv le nwg has rua puab lawm.
Vaajntxwv tsi yuav tej lug kws cov laug qha, nwg txhaj le has lug nyaav rua cov pejxeem,

lawv le cov tuavxaam hluas qha. Nwg has tas, “Tej num kws kuv txiv muab rua mej ua nyaav heev; tabsis kuv tseem yuav muab tej num kws nyaav tshaaj ntawd rua mej ua hab. Kuv txiv muab hlua tsaaj nplawm mej xwb, tabsis kuv yuav muab hlua tawv nplawm mej.”

Qhov kws Vaajntxwv tsi noog cov pejxeem lug ntawd, tub yog ua kuas tav lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas Ahiyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws nyob huv lub nroog Silaus moog has rua Nenpas tug tub Yelaunpau-aas ntaag.

Thaus cov pejxeem pum has tas, vaajntxwv tsi noog puab tej lug lawm, puab txhaj qw has tas, “Muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi moog nrug Daviv hab nwg tsev nyuas tuabneeg ntawd ua ke! Puab tub tsi tau ua ib yaam dlaabtsi paab peb le los sav? Cov Yixalayees, ca le rov qaab moog tsev los mas! Ca Lehaunpau-aas, rov kaav nwg xwb txhaj zoo!” Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj ntxeev sab,
ca Lehaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas xwb.

Ces Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas txhaj tso Adaunilaas tug kws saib cov tub zug moog cuag cov Yixalayees, tabsis puab muab pobzeb ntaus nwg tuag lawm. Thaus muaj tej nuav lawm, Lehaunpau-aas txhaj dlha ceev nrooj moog nce nwg lub tsheb neeg hab rov qaab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Txij nub ntawd lug, cov Yixalayees kws nyob saab Qaumteb txhaj ntxeev sab rua Daviv cov xeebntxwv lug le lawm.

Thaus cov Yixalayees nov has tas, Yelaunpau-aas rov nraag tebchaws Iziv lug lawm, puab txhaj caw nwg tuaj nrug puab saablaaj, hab puab muab nwg tsaa ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv. Tsuas yog tshuav cov Yudas tuab xeem txhaj tseem muab sab npuab Daviv cov xeebntxwv xwb.

Thaus Lehaunpau-aas lug txug rua huv nroog Yeluxalees, nwg txhaj txhij tau ib puas yim caum txheeb leej tubrog kws sab tawv heev huv xeem Yudas hab xeem Npeenyamees. Nwg yuam kuas puab moog tua cov Yixalayees saab qaumteb hab txeeb kuas tau lub tebchaws rov lug rua nwg kaav.
Tabsis Vaajtswv has rua Semayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug
kuas coj tej lug nuav moog has rua Lehaunpau-aas hab taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws yog xeem Yudas hab Npeenyamees has tas,

“Mej tsi xob moog tua mej cov kwvtij kws yog cov Yixalayees hlo le. Mej suavdlawg ca le rov qaab moog tsev. Yeej yog kuv pum zoo txhaj muaj tej xwm nuav tshwmsim tuaj.” Puab noog tug TSWV tej lug hab puab nyag txawm rov moog nyag tsev lawm.

Cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas moog txhim ntsaa yeej thaiv lub nroog Sekhees kws nyob peg laaj roob Efalayees hab nwg nyob peg tau ib ntus. Ces nwg muab lub nroog ntawd tso tseg hab moog khu lub nroog Penu-ees.

Nwg xaav has tas, “Yog kuv cov pejxeem pheej moog tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV nyob nraag lub Tuamtsev huv nroog Yeluxalees, nyob tsaam puab yuav ca le muab sab npuab cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas, ces puab yuav muab kuv tua povtseg.”
