Tom qaab kws nwg xaav tau le ntawd lawm, nwg txawm muab kub nchuav tau ob tug mlom nyuj hab has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Mej pheej moog pehawm Vaajtswv nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees tau ntev lug lawm, cov Yixalayees, mej saib saib, ob tug mlom nuav yog mej ob tug vaajtswv kws coj mej tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug ntaag!”
Nwg coj ob tug mlom nyuj ntawd ib tug moog teeb rua huv lub nroog Npethees, ib tug moog teeb rua huv lub nroog Daas.
Yog le ntawd, cov pejxeem txhaj ua txhum taag, puab moog pe ob tug mlom ntawd huv lub nroog Npethees hab huv lub nroog Daas.
Yelaunpau-aas tseem moog ua tej tsev teev mlom rua sau tej ncov roob hab tsaa tej tuabneeg kws tsi yog xeem Levis ua povthawj.

Yelaunpau-aas teem sijhawm rua lub yim hli nub kaum tsib, ca ua nub ua kevcai rooj noj rooj haus ib yaam le ua nraag tebchaws Yudas. Nwg muab tsaj tua hlawv rua sau lub thaaj txi tug mlom nyuj kws nwg teeb rua huv lub nroog Npethees. Hab nwg tsaa ib cov povthawj tu lub chaw teev mlom kws nwg ua rua huv lub nroog Npethees ntawd.

Thaus txug lub yim hli nub kaum tsib, yog nub kws nwg teem tseg, nwg txawm moog peg lub nroog Npethees hab tua tsaj txi tug mlom ntawd sau lub thaaj ua kevcai lawv le nwg tau teem tseg rua cov Yixalayees lawm.
Tug TSWV saamfwm kuas ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas moog rua peg lub nroog Npethees thaus Yelaunpau-aas tseem taabtom hlawv khoom fij ntawm lub thaaj

lawv le tug TSWV tej lug qha, tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, “Lub thaaj, lub thaaj, ib tug mivnyuas tub npe hu ua Yauxiyas yuav yug lug rua huv Daviv tsev tuabneeg. Nwg yuav muab cov cevlug kws pheej moog hlawv khoom fij rua sau tej chaw sab tua rua sau, hab nwg yuav muab tej pobtxhaa tuabneeg lug hlawv rua sau koj.”

Tug cev Vaajtswv lug txhaj has ntxiv has tas, “Lub thaaj nuav yuav qaug tawg ntsoog ntxawg, hab tej moov tshauv kws nyob sau lub thaaj yuav nchuav taag. Ces koj yuav paub has tas tej kws tug TSWV tau has rua kuv lawm, yeej muaj tseeb tag.”

Thaus Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas nov tej lug nuav, nwg txawm taw teg nki rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug hab has tas, “Ca le nteg tug tuabneeg nuav moog!” Taamsim ntawd vaajntxwv txhais npaab ca le qhuav kag nkaum tsi tau rov qaab le lawm.
Taamsim ntawd lub thaaj ca le qaug ntawg tawg ntsoog ntxawg hab tej moov tshauv nchuav taag rua huv aav, lawv le tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau tuav tug TSWV lub npe has lawm.

Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas txhaj has rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv paab kuv, hab thov nwg khu kuv txhais npaab lauj!” Tug cev Vaajtswv lug txhaj thov tug TSWV, ces vaajntxwv txhais npaab txawm zoo lawm.
Vaajntxwv has rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog tom kuv tsev hab kuv nrhav mov rua koj noj tsaiv. Hab kuv yuav pauj txaj ntsig rua koj tej kws koj tub ua pub rua kuv lawm.”
Tug cev Vaajtswv lug teb has tas, “Txawm yog koj muab koj tej nyaj ib nraab faib rua kuv los kuv yuav tsi nrug koj moog lossis nrug koj noj haus ib yaam dlaabtsi hlo le.
Tug TSWV yeej saamfwm rua kuv lawm, kuas kuv tsi xob noj lossis haus ib yaam dlaabtsi le, hab tsi xob taug txujkev kws kuv tuaj rov qaab moog tsev.”
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tsi taug txuj qub ke rov qaab, nwg txhaj moog dlua lwm txujkev lawm.

Lub sijhawm ntawd, muaj ib tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug nyob huv lub nroog Npethees. Nwg cov tub  txawm lug pav tej kws nub ntawd tug hluas kws cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj ua huv lub nroog Npethees, hab tej lug kws nwg has rua Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas rua puab txiv noog.
Tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug nug puab has tas, “Thaus nwg sawv kev moog tsev nwg taug txujkev twg lawm?” Puab txhaj qha kev rua nwg,
nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Muab kuv tug neeg luav lug pem eeb rua kuv.” Puab txawm ua le nwg has, hab nwg caij tug neeg luav

taug txujkev kws puab qha moog caum tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj hab moog caum cuag thaus nwg tseem su huv qaab tsob ntoo qheb. Tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug nug has tas, “Koj puas yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj?” Tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Kuv yog los mas.”
Tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv rov qaab moog tom kuv tsev, hab moog nrug kuv noj mov tsaiv.”
Tabsis tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj teb has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug koj moog tsi tau. Hab kuv yuav nrug koj noj haus ua ke qhov nuav tsi tau,
rua qhov tug TSWV yeej saamfwm rua kuv kuas tsi xob noj lossis haus ib yaam dlaabtsi le, hab tsi xob taug txujkev kws kuv tuaj rov qaab moog tsev.”

Ces tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj huv Npethees tuaj has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug ib yaam le koj hab. Tug TSWV tug timtswv lug has rua kuv kuas kuv tuaj coj koj nrug kuv moog tsev hab muab zaub mov rua koj noj.” Tabsis tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug dlaag xwb.
Yog le ntawd, tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj txhaj nrug tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug rov moog rua tom nwg tsev hab nrug nwg noj mov ua ke.
Thaus kws obtug tseem taabtom nyob ntawm rooj mov, tug TSWV lug has rua tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug,
ces nwg txhaj qw rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj has tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, koj tsi noog nwg lug hab tsi ua lawv le nwg tej lug saamfwm.
Koj tseem rov qaab lug noj mov rua huv qhov chaw kws nwg tsi pub koj noj. Vim le ntawd koj yuav raug tua tuag, hab yuav tsi coj koj lub cev moog log rua huv koj tsev tuabneeg lub qhov ntxaa.”
Ces thaus kws obtug noj mov taag lawm, tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug txhaj muab eeb moog pem rua sau tug neeg luav rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj
caij rov qaab. Muaj ib tug tsuv ntxhuav lug ntsib nwg tom kev hab muab nwg tum tuag lawm. Nwg lub cev pw xyaab leeg rua huv plawv kev, ces tug neeg luav hab tug tsuv ntxhuav sawv ib saab.

Muaj ib cov tuabneeg dlua kev tuaj pum lub cev tuag nyob huv plawv kev, hab tug tsuv ntxhuav sawv ze ntawd. Puab txawm moog rua peg lub nroog Npethees hab moog qha tej kws puab pum ntawd rua suavdlawg.

Thaus tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug nov dlheev le ntawd, nwg txawm has tas, “Tug ntawd tub yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm ntaag! Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj tso tug tsuv ntxhuav ntawd lug tum hab dlua kuas nwg tuag, lawv le tug TSWV tub has lawm tas, nwg yuav tuag le ntawd.”
Ces nwg txawm has rua nwg cov tub has tas, “Muab eeb moog pem rua sau kuv tug neeg luav rua kuv.” Puab txawm ua le nwg has,

Ces nwg txhaj caij neeg luav moog pum tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd tuag xyaab leeg rua huv plawv kev, tug neeg luav hab tug tsuv ntxhuav sawv nreg nreeg rua ib saab. Tug tsuv ntxhuav yeej tsi noj tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd lub cev ib qho hab tsi tum tug neeg luav le.
Tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd muab tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj nraag lub xeev Yudas tuaj tsaws rua sau tug neeg luav hab coj rov lug paam rua huv Npethees hab muab log lawm.
Tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug coj tug tuag ntawd moog log rua huv nwg tsev tuabneeg lub qhov ntxaa, nwg hab nwg cov tub quaj has tas, “Kuv tug kwv! Kuv tug kwv.”

Tom qaab kws puab muab tug tuag log taag lawm, tug laug kws cev Vaajtswv lug has rua nwg cov tub has tas, “Yog thaus twg kuv tuag, ces mej muab kuv log rua huv lub qhov ntxaa nuav hab muab kuv lub cev tso rua ntawm nwg ib saab.
Tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm kws tug cev Vaajtswv lug moog has tawmtsaam lub thaaj huv lub nroog Npethees hab tej chaw teev dlaab huv Xamalis, yeej muaj tseeb le ntawd tag.”

Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas tsi tso txujkev ua phem ua qas tseg le, nwg pheej xaiv tej caajceg kws yog tuabneeg dlog dlig tsaa ua povthawj tu tej thaaj kws nwg ua. Leejtwg xaav ua povthawj ces nwg pheej laam muab tug ntawd tsaa lug ua le.
Txujkev txhum kws nwg ua nuav txhaj le coj kev puamtsuaj lug raug nwg, nwg tsev tuabneeg hab nwg caajceg huv tuabsi.
Thaus lub sijhawm kws vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas tug tub Anpiyas mob nyaav heev lawm.

Yelaunpau-aas has rua nwg tug quaspuj tas, “Koj ca le tu cev kuas tsi xob muaj leejtwg paub koj, hab moog rua peg lub nroog Silaus kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug Ahiyas nyob. Nwg yog tug kws thaus u has tas, kuv yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees.
Koj nqaa kaum lub ncuav, ib cov ncuav fuam hab ib laamfwj zib ntaab moog rua nwg. Nug nwg saib yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim rua wb tug tub, ces nwg yuav qha rua koj.”
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog cuag Ahiyas rua peg lub nroog Silaus, thaus kws Ahiyas tub laug heev hab qhovmuag tsi pum kev lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua Ahiyas has tas, “Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj taabtom sawv kev tuaj cuag koj, nug txug nwg tug tub, vim nwg tug tub mob nyaav heev. Koj teb le nuav rua nwg.” Thaus Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj tuaj txug ndlua, nwg ua txuj ua le nwg tsi yog Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj.

Tabsis thaus Ahiyas nov nwg tuaj txug ntawm paws rooj, Ahiyas txawm hu has tas, “Lug tsev, kuv tub paub koj lawm, koj yog Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj. Vim le caag koj ua txuj ua le kws koj yog lwm tug? Kuv muaj xuv tsi zoo yuav qha rua koj paub.

Ca le rov qaab moog qha rua Yelaunpau-aas has tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has le nuav: ‘Nyob huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees mas kuv yeej xaiv koj hab tsaa koj lug ua tug kaav kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.

Kuv tub tshem lub tebchaws ntawm Daviv cov xeebntxwv lug hab muab cob rua koj lawm. Tabsis koj tsi ua koj lub neej zoo le kuv tug tubkhai Daviv tug kws fwm kuv, noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le tej kws kuv kuas nwg ua.
Koj tseem ua txhum luj tshaaj cov tuabneeg kws ua nom kaav ua ntej koj lawm hab. Koj tso kuv tseg moog puab mlom hab nchuav tej mlom tooj lug pe ua rua kuv chim.

Vim le nuav, kuv yuav tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua koj tsev tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav muab cov txivneej kws yog koj caajceg tua kuas tuag taag, kuv yuav ua rua cov laug hab cov hluas ib yaam nkaus. Kuv yuav muab koj tsev tuabneeg ua kuas tu noob nrho. Luas yuav tuaj muab puab cheb moog povtseg ib yaam le cheb tej plauv tshauv.

Koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws tuag rua huv nroog, dlev yuav tuaj muab noj kuas taag huv tuabsi, hab txhua tug kws tuag rua tom tej taj nraag los dlaav npoj yuav lug muab noj kuas taag. Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, yog tug kws has tej lug nuav ntaag.’ ”
Ahiyas has rua Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog tsev taamsim nuav. Thaus koj moog txug ndlua huv lub nroog, koj tug tub yuav tu sav nrho.

Cov Yixalayees yuav tuaj quaj nyav nwg hab muab nwg coj moog log. Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg, tsuas yog nwg tug tub tuab leeg txhaj le muab log muaj ntxaa. Rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, txaus sab rua nwg nkaus xwb.
Tug TSWV yuav tsaa dlua ib tug vaajntxwv lug kaav tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, nwg yuav muab Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg tua kuas tuag tu noob nrho.

Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua cov Yixalayees, hab puab yuav tshee ndluas txag ib yaam le tej lojkov kws nyob huv haav dlej. Nwg yuav muab cov Yixalayees ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws zoo tshaaj plawg kws nwg muab rua puab cov yawmkoob moog, hab nwg yuav muab puab lawv kuas tsiv dlhau plawg tug Dlej Efalates moog rua saab tim u, vim puab tau puab tej mlom quaspuj Aselas lug pe ua rua tug TSWV chim heev.
Vim Yelaunpau-aas tau ua txhum hab nwg coj cov Yixalayees moog ua kev txhum, tug TSWV txhaj muab cov Yixalayees tso povtseg lawm.”
Ces Yelaunpau-aas tug quaspuj txawm rov qaab lug rua huv lub nroog Tilexas. Thaus nwg lug txug ndlua huv tsev, nwg tug tub tu sav nrho.
Cov Yixalayees txhaj tuaj quaj nyav hab muab nwg coj moog log lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg tug tubkhai Ahiyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas ua taag lug, nwg tej kev ntaus rog hab tej kev tswjfwm, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Yelaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tau neeg nkaum xyoo. Nwg tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log, hab nwg tug tub Nadas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Xalumoos tug tub Lehaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj plaub caug ib xyoos, nwg ua vaajntxwv tau kaum xyaa xyoo nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws tug TSWV xaiv huv tebchaws Yixalayees lug ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm tug TSWV. Lehaunpau-aas nam hu ua Na-amas hab yog tuabneeg Amoos.
Cov Yudas tau ua txhum ntau yaam rua tug TSWV hab ua rua nwg chim heev tshaaj le thaus u puab cov yawmkoob tau ua lug lawm.
Puab ua tej chaw teev dlaab, txhus ncej zeb hab puab mlom Aselas rua puab pe sau tej ncov roob hab huv tej qaab ntoos.

Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, tseem muaj cov txivneej hab cov quaspuj kws pheej moog ua namndlav hab txivndlav huv tej tsev teev dlaab ntawd. Cov Yudas tau ua tej kev phem kev qas le cov tuabneeg thaus u kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej cov Yixalayees lug nyob.
Thaus Lehaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv tau tsib xyoos lawm, Vaajntxwv Sisas kws kaav tebchaws Iziv txawm tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Nwg coj taagnrho tej khoom muaj nqes kws muab tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv lub loog, hab tej thaiv nav ntaaj kws Xalumoos muab kub nchuav ua huv tuabsi moog lawm.
Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas maam le nchuav dlua ib cov thaiv nav ntaaj tooj lug hloov cov ntawd chaw, hab muab rua cov tub faajxwm kws zuv tej roojvaag tau siv.
Txhua zag kws vaajntxwv moog huv lub Tuamtsev, cov tub faajxwm yeej nqaa rawv cov thaiv nav ntaaj tooj ntawd nrug nwg moog hab coj rov lug ca rua huv cov tub faajxwm tej chaw.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Lehaunpau-aas ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Lehaunpau-aas hab Yelaunpau-aas obtug ib tug pheej ua rog rua ib tug taag obtug simneej le.

Lehaunpau-aas tuag hab luas muab nwg coj moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog (nwg nam hu ua Na-amas hab yog tuabneeg Amoos), hab nwg tug tub Anpiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Nenpas tug tub Yelaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau kaum yim xyoo lawm, Anpiyas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas,
hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb xyoos, Anpiyas nam hu ua Ma-akas hab yog Axaloos tug ntxhais.
Anpiyas ua txhum ib yaam le nwg txiv ua. Nwg yeej tsi fwm tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv le nwg yawmkoob Daviv lawm.
Tabsis vim muaj Daviv, tug TSWV kws yog Daviv tug Vaajtswv txhaj le pub Daviv tug xeebntxwv Anpiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw kaav lub nroog Yeluxalees hab tswj lub nroog ntawd nyob ruaj khov.

Tug TSWV ua le ntawd, vim Daviv yeej ua hum tug TSWV sab, hab nwg yeej tsi tau ua ib yaam dlaabtsi hlaa dlhau tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm le. Tsuas yog qhov kws nwg tau ua rua Uliyas kws yog tuabneeg Hitis xwb.
Yelaunpau-aas hab Anpiyas obtug rov pib ua rog sis tua moog txug thaus taag Anpiyas tam neej le hab.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Anpiyas ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Anpiyas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Axas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau neeg nkaum xyoo lawm, Axas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas,
hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau plaub caug ib xyoos. Nwg puj yog Axaloos tug ntxhais Ma-akas.
Axas ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg hum tug TSWV sab, ib yaam le thaus u nwg yawmkoob Daviv tau ua lug lawm.

Nwg muab cov txivneej hab cov quaspuj kws pheej ua namndlav txivndlav ntab tawm huv tej tsev teev dlaab huv nwg lub tebchaws moog, hab nwg muab tej mlom tooj kws nwg cov yawmkoob ua coj moog povtseg huv tuabsi.

Axas muab nwg puj Ma-akas lub meejmom kws yog puj vaajntxwv txu tsi pub ua ntxiv lawm, vim nwg yog tug kws has kuas txua tug mlom quaspuj Aselas. Axas txhaj muab tug mlom ntawd txav hab coj moog hlawv rua huv lub Haav Kiloos.
Txawm yog Axas tsi tau muab tej tsev teev dlaab rhuav kuas puamtsuaj taag los nwg yeej ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab muab sab npuab tug TSWV taag nwg simneej.
Nwg muab tej khoom kws nwg txiv muab fij rua Vaajtswv lawm, coj moog tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev nrug tej nyaj, tej kub kws nwg muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm.
Cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Axas hab cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Npasas, rov ua rog moog txug thaus taag obtug tam neej.
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Npasas moog tua cov Yudas hab tsim lub nroog Lamas ua chaw txav kev tsi pub cov Yudas moog lug.

Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Axas txhaj muab tej kub kws seem huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv lub loog rua nwg cov numtswv nqaa moog rua peg lub nroog Damaxes hab muab cob rua cov Xilias tug Vaajntxwv Npeehadas kws yog Taleemoos tug tub, hab yog Hexi-oos tug xeebntxwv, nrug cov lug has le nuav:

“Ca wb tuav teg ua phoojywg, ib yaam le thaus koj txiv hab kuv txiv ua phoojywg lug lawm. Cov nyaj hab cov kub nuav, yog coj tuaj pub rua koj ua kev sis raug zoo. Nwgnuav thov koj ca le txav kev ua phoojywg nrug cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Npasas, kuas nwg txhaj thim nwg cov tubrog tawm huv kuv cheebtsaam aav moog.”

Vaajntxwv Npeehadas pum zoo ua le Axas has, hab tso nwg cov thawj tubrog coj puab cov tubrog moog tua cov Yixalayees tej nroog. Puab moog txeeb tau lub nroog Iyoos, lub nroog Daas, lub nroog Anpees Npethes Ma-akas cheebtsaam kws ze Havtxwv Kalilais hab moog rua taagnrho cheebtsaam Nathalis.
Thaus Vaajntxwv Npasas nov tej xwmtxheej nuav tshwm tuaj lawm, nwg txawm tso tseg tsi khu lub nroog Lamas ntxiv, hab rov qaab moog rua huv lub nroog Tilexas lawm.

Vaajntxwv Axas txhaj le tso xuv moog rua cov pejxeem txhua tug thoob plawg tebchaws Yudas, kuas ca le tuaj paab tshem tej pobzeb hab tej ntoo kws Npasas coj tuaj khu lub nroog Lamas ntawd povtseg. Axas muab tej pobzeb hab tej ntoo ntawd moog ua lub nroog Nkenpas kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Npeenyamees hab lub nroog Mixepas.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Axas ua taag lug, nwg lub peevxwm, hab tej nroog kws nwg ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm,  tabsis thaus nwg laug lawm txawm muaj mob rua nwg ob txais kutaw.
Axas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Yehausafas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau ob xyoos lawm, Yelaunpau-aas tug tub Nadas maam ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg kaav tau ob xyoos.
Nwg coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le nwg txiv.
Ahiyas tug tub Npasas kws yog xeem Ixakhas tau ntxeev sab rua Nadas hab muab Nadas tua thaus Nadas hab nwg cov tubrog tseem taabtom moog vij lub nroog Nkinpethoos huv tebchaws Filitees.
Ces Npasas txhaj ua vaajntxwv hloov Nadas chaw. Thaus ntawd Axas tub ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau peb xyoos lawm.

Txij thaus ntawd lug, Npasas muab Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg tua tuag taag, lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws nwg has rua nwg tug tubkhai Ahiyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug huv lub nroog Silaus, ces Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg raug tua tuag tu noob nrho tsi tshuav ib tug le.
qhov kws muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav, tub yog vim Yelaunpau-aas ua rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv chim heev, vim tej kev txhum kws nwg ua hab coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Nadas ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv Axas hab cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Npasas, rov ua rog moog txug thaus taag obtug tam neej le hab.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau peb xyoos lawm, Ahiyas tug tub Npasas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Tilexas kaav tau neeg nkaum plaub xyoos.
Nwg coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le Yelaunpau-aas.
Tug TSWV has rua Yehus kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog Hananis tug tub, kuas moog has rua Npasas has le nuav:

“Koj yeej tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi, tabsis kuv tsaa koj ua tug thawjcoj coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Koj ua txhum ib yaam le Yelaunpau-aas ua, hab koj coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog ua txhum, ua rua kuv chim heev,
yog le ntawd, kuv yuav ua rua koj tsev tuabneeg kuas puamtsuaj, ib yaam le kuv ua rua Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg hab.
Koj tsev tuabneeg tug twg kws tuag rua huv nroog, dlev yuav tuaj muab noj kuas taag huv tuabsi, hab txhua tug twg kws tuag rua tom tej taj nraag los dlaav npoj yuav lug muab noj kuas taag.”
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Npasas ua taag lug, hab nwg lub peevxwm, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Npasas tuag hab luas muab nwg coj moog log rua huv lub nroog Tilexas, hab nwg tug tub Elas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Tug TSWV muab tej lug kws foom tsi zoo nuav rua Yehus kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug coj moog has rua Npasas hab nwg tsev tuabneeg, tub yog vim tej kws nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV. Qhov kws nwg ua rua tug TSWV chim, tsi yog vim tej kev phem kev qas kws nwg ua lawv le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas ua taag lug xwb, tabsis yog qhov kws nwg muab Yelaunpau-aas tsev tuabneeg tua tuag tu noob nrho lawm.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau neeg nkaum rau xyoo lawm, Npasas tug tub Elas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Tilexas kaav tau ob xyoos.

Ximelis kws yog Elas ib tug thawj saib ib nraab ntawm vaajntxwv cov tsheb neeg tau ntxeev sab rua vaajntxwv. Muaj ib nub Elas moog haus cawv huv Alexas tsev huv lub nroog Tilexas. Alexas yog tug kws saib lub loog.
Ximelis txawm nkaag moog muab Elas ntaus tuag rua huv lub tsev ntawd, hab nwg ua vaajntxwv hloov Elas chaw. Thaus ntawd Axas tub ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas tau neeg nkaum xyaa xyoo lawm.
Tom qaab kws Ximelis lug ua vaajntxwv tau tsi ntev, nwg muab Npasas tsev tuabneeg tua tuag tu noob nrho. Txhua tug txivneej kws yog Npasas kwvtij hab phoojywg, Ximelis muab tua taag huv tuabsi.
Qhov kws Ximelis muab Npasas tsev tuabneeg tua tuag taagnrho, yog lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas Yehus kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug moog has rua Npasas ntaag.
Qhov kws Npasas hab nwg tug tub Elas tau ua rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv chim, mas yog obtug pheej moog pe dlaab pe mlom hab coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Elas ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Thaus Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau neeg nkaum xyaa xyoo lawm, Ximelis maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Tilexas kaav cov Yixalayees tau xyaa nub. Thaus ntawd cov tubrog Yixalayees tseem taabtom moog puav tua cov Filitees lub nroog Nkinpethoos,

Ces thaus puab nov dlheev has tas, Ximelis ntxeev sab rua vaajntxwv hab muab vaajntxwv tua tuag lawm, taamsim ntawd puab ca le muab Aumelis kws yog puab tug thawj tubrog tsaa ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv.
Aumelis hab nwg cov tubrog ca le tso lub nroog Nkinpethoos tseg hab moog puav tua lub nroog Tilexas.
Thaus Ximelis pum has tas, lub nroog Tilexas poob lawm, nwg txawm moog rua huv chaav tsev huv plawv lub loog, tis suavtawg hlawv lub loog, ces nwg txhaj tuag rua huv lawm.
Tej xwm nuav tshwmsim, tub yog vim nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV, hab coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum, ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob Yelaunpau-aas ua.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Ximelis ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Thaus ntawd cov Yixalayees faib ua ob paab lawm: ib paab xaav tsaa Nkinas tug tub Tinpenis ua vaajntxwv, tabsis ib paab txaus sab rua Aumelis xwb.
Ces thaus kawg, paab kws txaus sab tuaj Aumelis tog yeej; puab txhaj muab Tinpenis tua tuag. Aumelis txhaj tau ua vaajntxwv.

Yog le ntawd, thaus Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau peb caug ib xyoos lawm, Aumelis maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg kaav tau kaum ob xyoos. Thawj rau lub xyoos nwg nyob huv lub nroog Tilexas kaav.

Nwg muab rau txheeb dlaim nyaj moog yuav tau lub laaj roob Xamalis ntawm ib tug txivneej hu ua Semelis. Ces Aumelis txawm moog txhim khu lub laaj roob ntawd, ua tau ib lub nroog rua sau, hab tis npe rua lub nroog ntawd hu ua Xamalis, lawv le Semelis lub npe kws yog tug qub tswv lub laaj roob ntawd.
Aumelis tseem ua txhum rua tug TSWV luj tshaaj cov vaajntxwv kws xub nyob ua ntej nwg lawm hab.
Nwg ua rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv chim heev, vim nwg tau coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum hab moog pe dlaab pe mlom ib yaam le thaus u Yelaunpau-aas tau ua lawm.
Dlua le lwm yaam kws Aumelis ua taag lug, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Aumelis tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv lub nroog Xamalis, hab nwg tug tub Ahaj ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus kws Axas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau peb caug yim xyoo lawm, Aumelis tug tub Ahaj maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau neeg nkaum ob xyoos.
Nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV heev tshaaj cov vaajntxwv thaus u ua lawm hab.

Tej kev txhum kws nwg ua le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas ua, tseem tsi txaus nwg sab hab; tsi taag le ntawd xwb, nwg moog yuav Vaajntxwv Enpa-aas tug ntxhais Yexenpees lug ua quaspuj hab moog pe tug mlom Npa-aas.
Nwg ua tau ib lub tsev teev Npa-aas rua huv lub nroog Xamalis, hab ua tau ib lub thaaj rua nwg, hab muab teeb rua huv lub tsev kws nwg ua teev tug mlom Npa-aas ntawd.

Nwg tseem puab tau ib tug mlom quaspuj Aselas lug rua suavdlawg pe. Nwg ua rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv chim rua nwg tshaaj cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv txhua tug kws tau ua taag lug lawm hab.

Thaus nwg tseem ua vaajntxwv, Hi-ees kws nyob huv Npethees txhaj tuaj khu lub nroog Yelikaus. Ces Hi-ees tug tub hlub kws hu ua Anpilaas tuag thaus nwg pib khu lub nroog Yelikaus, hab nwg tug tub ntxawg kws hu ua Xenkus tuag rua thaus nwg ua cov roojvaag, lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg rua Noos tug tub Yausuas lawm.

Muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug hu ua Eliyas nyob huv lub nroog Tisenpes huv lub cheebtsaam Nkile-as, nwg has rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj has tas, “Kuv tuav tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob, tug kws kuv naj nub ua nwg teg num lub npe has rua koj tas, ob lossis peb xyoos tom ntej nuav yuav tsi muaj ib ncos lwg lossis ib pluav naag lug le, moog txug thaus kuv has kuas muaj txhaj le yuav rov muaj.”
Ces tug TSWV has rua Eliyas has tas,
“Koj ca le tawm ntawm qhov chaw nuav moog rua saab nubtuaj, moog nkaum ze rua ntawm tug Dlej Khelis kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj.
Koj yuav tau tug dlej ntawd haus, hab kuv tub has kuas uab laag nqaa mov lug rua koj noj nyob qhov ntawd lawm.”
Eliyas txhaj ua lawv le tug TSWV has. Nwg txawm moog nyob ntawm tug Dlej Khelis.
Nwg haus tug Dlej ntawd hab uab laag pheej nqaa mov hab nqaj lug rua nwg noj txhua taagkig hab txhua mo.
Tabsis tsi ntev tom qaab ntawd, tug dlej kuj qhuav taag vim tsi muaj naag lug.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Eliyas has tas,

“Koj ca le sawv kev moog rua peg lub nroog Xalefas kws nyob ze lub nroog Xidoos, hab moog nyob qhov ntawd, kuv tub has rua ib tug puj ntsuag kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd kuas nwg pub zaub pub mov rua koj noj lawm.”

Yog le ntawd, Eliyas txhaj moog rua peg lub nroog Xalefas. Thaus nwg moog txug ntawm lub roojvaag nroog, nwg pum ib tug puj ntsuag taabtom tuaj khaws tawg. Eliyas txawm has rua tug puj ntsuag ntawm has tas, “Thov koj cug mivntsiv dlej tuaj pub rua kuv haus.”
Thaus tug puj ntsuag taabtom rov moog nqaa dlej, Eliyas txawm hu has tas, “Thov nqaa mivntsiv mov tuaj pub kuv noj hab.”

Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv thov coglug rua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob has tas, kuv tsi muaj mov lawm. Kuv tsuas tshuav ib nyuas taus moov nplej nyob huv taig hab ib qhov nyuas roj txiv ntoo nyob huv qaab hub lawm xwb. Kuv tuaj khaws tawg coj moog rauv ua qhov nyuas moov nplej ntawd rua kuv hab kuv tug tub noj. Pluag mov nuav yog pluag mov kawg, ces wb tog tuag lawm xwb.”

Eliyas txawm has rua tug puj ntsuag ntawd has tas, “Koj tsi xob txhawj, ca le moog ua koj pluag mo, tabsis xub ua ib qho miv miv nqaa tuaj rua kuv noj tsaiv, koj maam le rov moog muab qhov seem ua rua koj hab koj tug tub noj.
Vim tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has le nuav: ‘Cov moov nplej huv lub taig yuav tsi paub taag hab cov roj huv lub hub yuav tsi paub qhuav ua ntej kws tug TSWV tso naag lug.’ ”
Tug puj ntsuag ntawd txhaj moog ua lawv le Eliyas has rua nwg, puab txhaj muaj mov txaus noj ntau nub.
Lawv le tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua Eliyas lawm has tas, “Cov moov nplej huv lub taig yuav tsi paub taag, hab cov roj huv lub hub yuav tsi paub qhuav.”
Tsi ntev tom qaab nuav, muaj ib nub tug puj ntsuag ntawd tug tub txawm mob; nwg mob nyaav heev zuj zug, ces nwg txawm tuag lawm.

Tug puj ntsuag ntawd has rua Eliyas has tas, “Koj tub yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg, ua le caag koj txhaj ua le nuav rua kuv? Koj tuaj ntawm nuav, yog koj tuaj ua kuas Vaajtswv ncu txug kuv tej kev txhum kws kuv tau ua taag lug lawm, kuas kuv tug tub tuag xwb los?”

Eliyas has tas, “Ca le puag koj tug tub lug rua kuv.” Eliyas tsaws hlo tug mivtub ntawm leej nam xubndlag, puag moog rua sau chaav kws Eliyas nyob, hab muab tug tub ntawd tso pw rua sau Eliyas lub txaaj.

Ces Eliyas tsaa ncauj thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, vim le caag koj ua rua tug puj ntsuag nuav tau kev txomnyem ua luaj nuav? Nwg yog tug kws muaj lub sab dlawb pub zaub pub mov rua kuv noj, vim le caag koj ua rua nwg tug tub tuag lawm?”
Ces Eliyas txawm qhau cev hlo pw tsuam tug tub ntawd lub cev peb zag, hab thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov koj rau sav rau paa rua tug tub nuav kuas rov muaj sa lauj!”
Tug TSWV teb Eliyas tej lug thov; ces tug tub ntawd txawm ua paa hab rov muaj sa lawm.
Eliyas txhaj puag tug tub ntawd nqeg lug rua txheej tsev huv qaab nuav, muab rua leej nam hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj saib, koj tug tub rov muaj sa lawm.”
Tug puj ntsuag ntawd teb has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv paub lawm has tas koj yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg hab yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tag.”
Tau ib ntus tom qaab nuav, yog xyoo peb kws ntuj qhua teb nkig ntawd, tug TSWV has rua Eliyas has tas, “Koj ca le moog cuag Vaajntxwv Ahaj, kuv yuav tso naag lug.”
Yog le ntawd, Eliyas txhaj moog lawm. Thaus ntawd muaj kev tshaib nqhes nyob huv lub xeev Xamalis,
Vaajntxwv Ahaj txhaj hu kuas Aunpadiyas tug kws saib lub loog moog cuag nwg. (Aunpadiyas yog ib tug kws fwm tug TSWV heev.

Thaus Yexenpees nteg tug TSWV cov cevlug tua povtseg, Aunpadiyas tau coj cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd ib puas leej moog zais rua huv ob lub qhov tsua, ib paab tsib caug leej, nwg xaa zaub mov hab dlej moog rua puab noj hab haus.)

Ahaj has rua Aunpadiyas has tas, “Wb ca le tawm moog saib  txhua lub qhovdlej txhawv hab txhua lub haav thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws nuav saib puas pum muaj zaub nyob qhov twg txaus peb tej neeg hab tej neeg luav noj, txhaj cawm tau tej tsaj ntawd. Peb tej tsaj txhaj yuav tsi tuag tshaib.”
Ces obtug txawm pum zoo muab lub tebchaws faib lawv le obtug nyam, ces obtug nyag moog nyag rua ib txujkev lawm.
Thaus Aunpadiyas taabtom taug kev moog, nwg txawm ntsib Eliyas. Nwg tseem ncu tau Eliyas, nwg txhaj nyo hau ntshis hawm hab nug has tas, “Koj puas yog Eliyas?”
Eliyas teb has tas, “Kuv yog Eliyas.” Koj ca le rov qaab moog hab qha rua koj tug tswv kws yog Vaajntxwv has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Aunpadiyas teb has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum dlaabtsi, koj txhaj yuav muab kuv cob rua Ahaj txhais teg? Kuv ntshai nyob tsaam nwg muab kuv tua povtseg?

Kuv thov coglug ntawm tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob has tas, vaajntxwv tub khaiv tuabneeg moog nrhav koj rua txhua lub tebchaws thoob plawg huv nplajteb nuav lawm. Yog tug nom kws kaav lub tebchaws twg has tas, tsi pum koj nyob huv nwg lub tebchaws, ces Ahaj yuav kuas tug kws kaav lub tebchaws ntawd tsaa teg twv has tas, nwg yeej tsi pum koj nyob qhov twg le.
Nwgnuav koj tsua xaav le caag, koj txhaj kuas kuv moog qha rua nwg has tas koj nyob ntawm nuav?

Nyob tsaam thaus kuv taabtom moog lawm, tug TSWV tug Ntsujplig lug coj koj moog rua qhov chaw kws tsi muaj tuabneeg paub lawm ne? Ces thaus kuv moog qha rua Ahaj has tas koj nyob ntawm nuav, tabsis nwg tsuas tuaj nrhav tsi tau koj, ces thaus ntawd nwg yuav muab kuv tua povtseg xwb. Koj ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv yeej yog tug kws ibtxwm pehawm tug TSWV thaus kuv tseem yog mivnyuas yau lug lawm.

Koj puas nov zaaj kws Yexenpees nteg tug TSWV cov cevlug tua povtseg, kuv coj tau ib puas leej moog zais rua huv ob lub qhov tsua, ib paab twg tsib caug leej, kuv xaa zaub mov hab dlej moog rua puab noj hab haus?
Yog le ntawd, koj yuav ua le caag khaiv kuv moog qha rua vaajntxwv has tas koj nyob ntawm nuav? Nwg yeej yuav muab kuv tua povtseg xwb!”

Eliyas teb has tas, “Kuv thov coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug kws kuv naj nub ua nwg teg num has tas, nub nua kuv yuav moog kuas tshwm ntsej tshwm muag rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj pum ntaag!”
Yog le ntawd, Aunpadiyas txhaj moog cuag Vaajntxwv Ahaj hab qha zaaj nuav rua nwg, ces Ahaj txawm moog cuag Eliyas.
Thaus Ahaj pum dlheev Eliyas, Ahaj has tas, “Tub yog koj ntaag, koj yog tug kws ua rua cov Yixalayees tau kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv kawg le!”

Eliyas teb has tas, “Kuv tsi yog tug kws ua kuas cov Yixalayees tau kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv. Tub yog koj hab koj txiv ntaag, rua qhov meb tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm, hab meb pheej moog pe tej mlom Npa-aas ntaag.

Nwgnuav koj ca le moog hu cov Yixalayees tuaj cuag kuv rua sau lub Roob Kalemees nuav. Coj plaub puas tsib caug leej kws cev Npa-aas lug hab plaub puas leej kws cev tug mlom quaspuj Aselas lug kws yog nam Vaajntxwv Yexenpees ua tug pub kev noj haus rua puab, kuas tuaj rua ntawm nuav huv tuabsi.”
Yog le ntawd, Ahaj txhaj hu cov Yixalayees hab cov cev Npa-aas lug tuaj sis sau ua ke rua sau lub Roob Kalemees.

Eliyas txaav zog moog sawv rua ntawm cov pejxeem hab has tas, “Mej tseem yuav ua tuabneeg muaj ob lub sab moog txug thaus twg? Yog has tas tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv tag, suavdlawg ca le pehawm nwg; tabsis yog has tas Npa-aas yog vaajtswv, ces suavdlawg ca le pe Npa-aas los mas!” Tabsis cov pejxeem tsi teb ib lus le.
Eliyas txawm has tas, “Cov kws cev tug TSWV lug tsuas tshuav kuv tuab leeg lawm xwb, tabsis cov kws cev Npa-aas lug muaj plaub puas tsib caug leej dlag.

Ca le caab ob tug txiv nyuj lug; muab ib tug rua cov cev Npa-aas lug, muab tug nyuj ntawd tua txav ua tej thooj hab coj moog tso rua sau pawg tawg, tabsis tsi xob zig suavtawg rua le. Kuv maam muab dlua ib tug txiv nyuj tua hab ua ib yaam le puab ua ntawd.

Ces kuas cov cev Npa-aas lug thov puab tug vaajtswv, hab kuv yuav thov kuv tug Vaajtswv. Yog tug twg tso suavtawg lug kub, tug ntawd txhaj yog Vaajtswv tag.” Cov pejxeem txhaj qw has tas, peb pum zoo ua le koj has ko ntaag.

Ces Eliyas has rua cov cev Npa-aas lug tas, “Mej yog cov coob, ca mej xub moog xaiv tug txiv nyuj hab coj moog tua ua ntej. Tabsis tsi xob zig suavtawg rua cov tawg le, thov mej tug vaajtswv kuas nwg tso suavtawg lug kub nkaus xwb.”

Puab txawm muab tug txiv nyuj kws puab caab tuaj ntawd tua hab thov puab tug Npa-aas moog txug thaus taav su. Puab qw has tas, “Npa-aas, thov teb peb lauj!” Hab puab dlha moog dlha lug ncig lub thaaj kws puab ua ntawd. Tabsis tsi muaj ib lub suab dlaabtsi teb puab le.

Ces thaus taav su, Eliyas has lug twm puab tas: “Thov kuas nrov mivntsiv hab maj! Nwg yog vaajtswv, tej zag nwg tseem xaav lwm yaam lossis nwg tseem taabkaum lossis nwg tseem taug kev moog rua lwm qhov lossis nwg tseem tsaug zug lawm, mas mej yuavtsum tsaa kuas nwg sawv!”
Yog le ntawd, cov cev Npa-aas lug txhaj qw nrov tshaaj qhov qub, puab muab ntaaj muab rag hlais puab lub cev ua ntshaav nrug lab vog, lawv le kevcai kws puab ibtxwm ua lug lawm.
Puab qw ua nqaaj ua nqug moog txug thaus nub qaij; tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg teb, hab tsi nov suab dlaabtsi le.
Ces Eliyas txawm has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Mej txaav lug ze kuv.” Puab txawm txaav lug sawv vij Eliyas. Eliyas txawm muab tug TSWV lub thaaj kws tub qaug taag lawm khu rov rua.
Nwg muab kaum ob lub pobzeb lug, ib lub rua ib xeem lawv le Yakhauj kaum ob leeg tub ntawd tej npe, Yakhauj yog tug kws tug TSWV tis dlua ib lub npe hu ua Yixalayees.
Eliyas muab cov pobzeb ntawd txhim ua ib lub thaaj ua qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV. Nwg khawb ib tug kwj ncig lub thaaj ntawd, kuas ntim tau le ob thoob dlej.

Ces nwg muab tawg moog tso rua sau lub thaaj, muab tug txiv nyuj tua txav ua tej thooj hab coj moog tso rua sau cov tawg. Nwg txawm has tas, “Ca le coj plaub lub hub moog ntim dlej kuas puv nkaus rua hab nqaa lug laub rua sau cov khoom fij hab cov tawg nuav.” Puab txawm ua lawv le nwg has ntawd.
Eliyas has tas, “Rov nqaa dlej lug laub ntxiv dlua.” Puab rov ua dlua le nwg has. Nwg rov has tas, “Rov nqaa dlej lug laub ntxiv dlua.” Ces puab rov qaab ua dlua ib zag hab.
Cov dlej ndlwg sau lub thaaj lug puv nkaus tug kwj kws khawb ncig lub thaaj.

Ces thaus nub qaij kws txug lub caij fij khoom, Eliyas txhaj txaav zog lug rua ntawm lub thaaj hab thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, nub nua thov koj ca le ua kuas suavdlawg pum has tas, koj yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv hab kuv yog koj tug tubkhai hab tej kws kuv ua nuav yog koj kuas kuv ua.
Thov teb kuv lauj tug TSWV, thov teb kuv, kuas cov tuabneeg nuav txhaj paub has tas koj yog tug TSWV, tug Vaajtswv kws taabtom coj puab rov lug cuag koj.”
Tug TSWV txawm tso suavtawg lug kub cov khoom fij, cov tawg, cov pobzeb, cov aav hab cov dlej huv tug kwj taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus cov pejxeem pum le ntawd, puab txawm qhau cev hlo rua huv aav hab qw nrov nrov has tas, “Tug TSWV txhaj yog Vaajtswv; tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv tag.”

Eliyas has tas, “Mej ca le nteg cov xwbfwb cev Npa-aas lug nuav; tsi xob pub ib tug dlim le!” Cov pejxeem nteg tau puab txhua tug, hab Eliyas coj puab moog tua povtseg taag rua nraag tug Dlej Kisoos lawm.
Eliyas has rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj has tas, “Koj ca le moog hab noj mov taamsim nuav. Kuv nov suab naag tub lug yuav txug.”
Thaus Ahaj moog noj mov lawm, Eliyas txawm nce moog rua sau ncov Roob Kalemees, nwg txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav hab khoov ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus rua ntawm nwg ob lub hauvcaug.

Eliyas has rua nwg tug tubkhai has tas, “Taamsim nuav koj ca le moog saib tom havtxwv saib.” Tug tubkhai txawm moog saib hab rov lug has tas, “Kuv tsi pum dlaabtsi le.” Eliyas kuas nwg moog saib xyaa zag.

Zag xyaa nwg rov lug hab has tas, “Kuv pum ib tauv fuab miv miv luaj lub xibteg sawv huv havtxwv tuaj xwb.” Eliyas has rua nwg tug tubkhai has tas, “Koj ca le moog has rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj, kuas nwg kawgkag nce rua huv nwg lub tsheb neeg, hab moog tsev ua ntej naag lug taav nwg kev.”

Ces tuab plag ntshis xwb, fuab tsaus nti ib tog tuaj puv nkaus sau nruab ntug, cua pib ntsawj hab tuamtsaam naag nrov nroo ntwg sau ntuj lug. Ahaj txhaj nce rua huv nwg lub tsheb neeg hab rov qaab moog rua huv lub nroog Yexelees lawm.
Tug TSWV lub fwjchim lug kaav nkaus Eliyas; nwg qaws hlo tsho khi nkaus rua sau dluav hab dlha ceev heev fuas kag Ahaj ntej moog txug ndlua huv Yexelees.
Vaajntxwv Ahaj pav txhua yaam kws Eliyas ua, hab zaaj kws Eliyas tua cov xwbfwb cev Npa-aas lug ntawd rua Yexenpees kws yog nam vaajntxwv noog.

Yexenpees txawm tso tuabneeg moog has rua Eliyas has tas, “Pigkig thaus txug lub caij nuav, yog kuv tsi tau ua rua koj ib yaam le koj ua rua cov xwbfwb cev Npa-aas lug, thov tej vaajtswv ca le muab kuv tua kuas tuag.”
Eliyas ntshai heev, nwg txhaj nrhav kev tsiv nkaum; nwg coj nwg tug tubkhai moog rua nraag lub nroog Npesenpas kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas. Eliyas muab nwg tug tubkhai tso tseg rua nraag,

Eliyas moog ib nub ke rua tom roob mojsaab qhua. Nwg moog nkaum tshaav rua huv qaab ib tsob ntoo hab nwg xaav tuag lawm xwb. Nwg txhaj thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV, txaus kuv lawm lauj. Ca le rhu kuv txujsa moog; kuv tuag yuav zoo dlua!”
Nwg txawm qhau cev hlo pw huv qaab ntoo hab tsaug zug hlas lawm. Ces taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib tug timtswv ceebtsheej lug tuav nkaus nwg hab has tas, “Eliyas, koj ca le sawv lug noj mov.”
Eliyas tsim dlheev lug xaam ncig leeg, nwg pum ib lub ncuav hab ib hub dlej nyob ze ntawm nwg taubhau, nwg txawm muab lug noj hab haus taag, nwg rov qhau cev pw dlua lawm hab.
Ces tug TSWV tug timtswv rov lug tsaa Eliyas dlua zag ob has tas, “Eliyas, koj ca le sawv lug hab noj mov, nyob tsaam koj tsi muaj zug taug kev.”
Eliyas sawv lug noj mov hab haus dlej. Cov mov ntawd ua rua nwg muaj zug taug kev tau plaub caug nub moog txug rua tom Roob Xinais kws yog Vaajtswv lub Roob Dlawbhuv.
Eliyas nkaag moog pw ib mos huv lub qhov tsua. Ces tug TSWV txawm lug has rua Eliyas has tas, “Eliyas, koj tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm nuav?”

Eliyas teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, kuv ibtxwm ua koj teg num. Tabsis cov Yixalayees tsi coj lawv le tej lug kws puab tau cog tseg rua koj, puab muab koj tej thaaj rhuav hab muab koj cov cevlug tua povtseg taag lawm. Tsuas tshuav kuv tuab leeg xwb los puab tseem nrhav kuv tua povtseg hab!”

Tug TSWV teb Eliyas has tas, “Koj ca le tawm moog sawv sau ncov roob taabmeeg kuv.” Tug TSWV txawm hlaa lug moog hab ua cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj tej pov roob tawg pleb zum zawg hab tej pobzeb tawg dlawb vog, tabsis tug TSWV tsi nyob huv cov cua ntawd. Tom qaab cua tu lawm, txawm muaj aav qeeg, tabsis tug TSWV tsi nyob huv qhov kws aav qeeg ntawd hab.
Tom qaab aav qeeg taag txawm muaj suavtawg, tabsis tug TSWV tsi nyob huv cov suavtawg ntawd le hab. Ces thaus cov suavtawg dlhau lawm, txawm muaj ib lub suab has yau yau tuaj.

Thaus Eliyas nov lub suab ntawd, nwg txawm muab nwg lub tsho lug npug nwg ntsejmuag hab tawm moog sawv ntawm rooj tsuas. Muaj ib lub suab has rua Eliyas has tas, “Eliyas, koj tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm nuav?”

Eliyas teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, kuv ibtxwm ua koj teg num. Tabsis cov Yixalayees tsi coj lawv le tej lug kws puab tau cog tseg rua koj, puab muab koj tej thaaj rhuav, hab muab koj cov cevlug tua povtseg taag lawm. Tsuas tshuav kuv tuab leeg xwb los puab tseem nrhav kuv tua povtseg hab!”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog rua peg tebchaws mojsaab qhua kws ze lub nroog Damaxes, moog rua huv lub nroog hab muab roj laub rua Haxayees taubhau tsaa nwg ua cov Xilias tug vaajntxwv;

muab roj laub rua sau Nimesis tug tub Yehus taubhau, tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab muab roj laub rua sau Safas kws yog tuabneeg Anpees Mehaulas tug tub Elisas taubhau, tsaa nwg ua tug cev kuv lug hloov koj chaw.
Yog leejtwg tsiv dlim tsi raug Haxayees tua tuag, tug ntawd yuav raug Yehus tua tuag, hab yog leejtwg tsiv dlim tsi raug Yehus tua tuag, tug ntawd yuav raug Elisas tua tuag.
Tabsis kuv tseem tseg xyaa txheeb leej nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav, puab yog cov kws muaj lub sab npuab kuv, puab tsi tau txhus caug pe Npa-aas hab nwj nwg cov mlom le.”

Eliyas moog ntsib Elisas thaus nwg tseem taabtom tsaav khais laij teb; muaj kaum ib nkawm txiv nyuj laij ua nwg ntej, nwg yog tug kws tsaav khais rua nkawm kawg tom qaab. Eliyas hle hlo nwg lub tsho luj hab muab rua Elisas naav.

Elisas txawm tso plhuav nwg ob tug nyuj tseg, moog caum Eliyas qaab hab has tas, “Thov ca kuv moog nwj kuv nam kuv txiv ncaim obtug tsaiv, kuv maam le nrug koj moog.” Eliyas teb has tas, “Tau los mas, koj ca le moog, kuv tsi txwv koj le.”

Elisas txawm muab nwg ob tug txiv nyuj tua, hab muab tug quabtwg lug ua tawg rauv hau cov nqaj. Elisas muab cov nqaj faib rua suavdlawg noj. Ces Elisas txawm nrug Eliyas moog hab ua tug paab Eliyas lawm.

Cov Xilias tug Vaajntxwv Npeehadas hu taagnrho nwg cov tubrog tuaj ua ke, hab tseem muaj peb caug ob tug vaajntxwv muab puab tej neeg hab tej tsheb neeg tuaj paab nwg. Nwg txhaj sawv kev tuaj moog vij lub nroog Xamalis hab tua lub nroog ntawd.
Nwg tso tuabneeg moog has rua cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Ahaj huv lub nroog tas, “Vaajntxwv Npeehadas has le nuav tas,
‘Koj tej nyaj tej kub yog kuv le, koj cov quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas kws zoo nkauj zoo nraug puavleej yog kuv le hab.’ ”
Ahaj teb has tas, “Mej moog has rua kuv tug tswv kws yog Vaajntxwv Npeehadas has tas, kuv yeej zoo sab muab rua nwg, kuv hab txhua yaam kws kuv muaj puavleej yog nwg tug huv tuabsi.”
Npeehadas rov tso tuabneeg coj nwg tej lug moog has rua Ahaj dlua ntxiv le nuav, “Kuv rov tso xuv tuaj rua koj, koj ca le xaa koj tej nyaj tej kub, koj cov quaspuj hab koj cov mivnyuas tuaj rua kuv.
Tabsis pigkig lub sijhawm nuav, kuv yuav tso kuv cov numtswv tuaj tshawb huv koj lub loog hab huv koj cov numtswv tej tsev, hab txhua yaam kws zoo, puab  yuav nqaa moog kuas taag.”

Vaajntxwv Ahaj hu taagnrho nwg cov thawjcoj huv nwg lub tebchaws tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Thov mej nrug nov, tug tuabneeg nuav nwg xaav tuaj nrhav kev kub ntxhuv rua peb xwb. Nwg tso xuv tuaj rua kuv has tas, nwg yuav yuav kuv cov quaspuj, kuv cov mivnyuas hab kuv tej nyaj tej kub. Txawm le ntawd los kuv yeej txaus sab muab rua nwg.”
Cov thawjcoj ntawd teb has tas, “Tsi xob noog nwg has; hab tsi xob muab rua nwg hlo le.”

Yog le ntawd, Ahaj txhaj teb rua Npeehadas cov tuabneeg xaa xuv has tas, “Mej moog has rua vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv has tas, nwg thawj tsaab xuv mas kuv txaus sab muab ntaag, tabsis tsaab ob nuav, kuv tsi txaus sab muab le nwg has ntawd.” Cov xaa xuv coj tej lug ntawd rov moog has rua Npeehadas hab puab rov coj dlua lwm tsaab xuv ntawm

Npeehadas tuaj has tas, “Kuv yuav coj tubrog coob heev tuaj rhuav koj lub nroog nuav, hab koj tej nyuas thwvcib kws tawg ua moov, tub tsi txaus kuv cov tuabneeg ib leeg nqaa ib taus moog. Yog tsi muaj le kuv has nuav, ces thov kuas tej vaajtswv muab kuv tua kuas tuag!”

Vaajntxwv Ahaj teb has tas, “Mej rov moog has rua Vaajntxwv Npeehadas has tas, tug kws yog tubrog tag, nwg yeej tsi tso cuabyeej ua rog tseg ua ntej nwg tua yeej rog, tabsis thaus yeej rog lawm, nwg maam tso tseg.”

Thaus Npeehadas tau txais Ahaj tej lug teb nuav, nwg tseem taabtom nrug cov numtswv kws tuaj nwg tog haus cawv huv puab tej tsevntaub. Nwg txhaj has kuas nwg cov tubrog ca le npaaj moog sis tua, yog le ntawd, puab txhaj npaaj moog tua lub nroog ntawd.

Taamsim ntawd, txawm muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Ahaj hab has rua nwg tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, koj puas pum paab tubrog coob coob ntawd? Nub nua kuv yuav pub kuas koj tua yeej puab, koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV tag.”

Ahaj nug has tas, “Leejtwg yuav ua tug thawjcoj peb moog tua?” Tug cev Vaajtswv lug teb has tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, yog cov tswvxeev tej tubrog hluas yuav ua tej nuav ntaag.” Vaajntxwv rov nug has tas, “Leejtwg yuav ua tug thawjcoj peb tag?” Tug cev Vaajtswv lug teb has tas, “Koj yog tug coj ntaag!”

Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv txhaj txhij tau ob puas peb caug ob leeg tubrog hluas ntawm cov thawj tubrog kws saib tej cheebtsaam tuaj txoos ua ke. Nwg txhij tau xyaa txheeb leej tubrog Yixalayees tuaj ntxiv.
Puab txawm tawm moog sis tua thaus taav su. Ces Npeehadas hab peb caug ob tug vaajntxwv kws tuaj nwg tog tseem taabtom haus cawv huv tej tsevntaub.
Cov tubrog hluas tawm moog ua ntej. Ces cov tubrog kws Npeehadas tso moog tshuajxwm dlha rov lug qha rua nwg has tas, “Muaj ib paab tubrog taabtom tawm huv lub nroog Xamalis tuaj lawm.”
Npeehadas has tas, “Txawm yog puab tuaj nrug peb sis tua lossis tuaj nrug peb cog kev phoojywg los xij, mej ca le muab puab nteg kag caab lug.”
Cov tubrog hluas txawm ua cov ntaus thawjcoj puab kev moog, ces cov tubrog Yixalayees maam le lawv qaab,

hab txhua tug yeebncuab kws puab pum, puab muab tua tuag taag huv tuabsi. Cov Xilias swb hab tsiv tawm, cov tubrog Yixalayees caum qaab tua, tabsis Npeehadas caij neeg nrug cov tubrog kws caij neeg tsiv dlim lawm.
Vaajntxwv Ahaj moog rua tom taj nraag, moog puav nteg  cov neeg, cov tsheb neeg hab muab cov tubrog Xilias tua tuag taag rua tod.

Ces tug cev Vaajtswv lug rov moog has rua Vaajntxwv Ahaj has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog txhij tubrog kuas coob ntxiv hab yuavtsum ceevfaaj npaaj kuas zoo, rua qhov lwm xyoo txug lub caij ntuj naag, cov Xilias tug vaajntxwv yuav rov tuaj tua mej dlua.”

Vaajntxwv Npeehadas cov numtswv has rua nwg has tas, “Cov Yixalayees tej vaajtswv yog tej vaajtswv kws nyob sau roob xwb, tub yog vim le ntawd cov Yixalayees txhaj tua yeej peb. Tabsis yog peb moog tua puab nraag taj nraag, peb yuav tua yeej puab xwb.
Nwgnuav ca le tshem peb caug ob tug vaajntxwv ntawd tawm ntawm puab lub luag num hab coj puab moog nrug cov thawj tubrog tom taj nraag nyob.

Txhij tubrog ntxiv kuas coob npaum le cov kws thaus u koj coj moog tuag taag lawm; npaaj neeg hab tsheb neeg kuas ntau ib yaam le cov qub, peb yuav moog tua cov Yixalayees nyob tom taj nraag, mas zag nuav peb yuav tua yeej puab xwb.” Vaajntxwv Npeehadas txawm pum zoo ua lawv le puab has ntawd.
Ces thaus kws txug ndlua lub caij ntuj naag, Npeehadas txawm txhij nwg cov tubrog hab nwg nrug puab tuaj tua cov Yixalayees tom lub nroog Afekas.

Cov Yixalayees txhij tubrog hab npaaj cuabyeej; puab faib ua ob paab moog tsuam yeej nyob sis ncaag zog cov Xilias. Cov Xilias nyob puv nkaus rua tom taj nraag, tabsis cov Yixalayees tsuas zoo le ob paab nyuas tshis kws tsawg tsawg xwb.

Ces tug cev Vaajtswv lug txawm moog cuag Vaajntxwv Ahaj hab has rua nwg has tas, “Tug TSWV has rua koj has tas, vim cov Xilias has tas, kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws nyob sau tej roob xwb, kuv tsi yog tug Vaajtswv kws nyob nraag taj nraag, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav pub kuas koj tua yeej puab cov tubrog kws coob heev ntawd, koj hab koj cov tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV tag!”
Cov Xilias hab cov Yixalayees tsuam yeej nyob sis ncaag, ib paab nyob ib saab tau xyaa nub. Ces nub xyaa puab txawm pib sis tua, nub ntawd cov Yixalayees tua cov Xilias tuag ib puas txheeb leej.

Cov seem tuag kws tsiv moog cawm sav rua huv lub nroog Afekas los tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nrog tseem qaug lug ntaus puab tuag lawm neeg nkaum xyaa txheeb leej hab. Npeehadas tsiv moog rua huv lub nroog, hab nwg moog nkaum rua huv ib chaav tsev.

Npeehadas cov numtswv tuaj cuag nwg hab has rua nwg tas, “Peb nov has tas, cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv muaj lub sab taabncuab heev. Thov tso cai rua peb muab tej rig tsho ntaub tsaaj rua peb paav dluav hab muab hlaab rig peb taubhau, moog cuag cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv, tej zag nwg yuav tseg koj txujsa.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab tej ntaub tsaaj lug paav dluav hab muab hlaab rig taubhau, ces puab txawm moog cuag Ahaj hab has tas, “Koj tug tubkhai Npeehadas thov kuas koj tseg nwg txujsa nyob.” Ahaj teb has tas, “Nwg tseem muaj sa nyob hab los? Zoo lawm lauj! Nwg zoo le kuv ib tug kwvtij hab ntaag.”

Npeehadas cov numtswv tog ntsoov saib Ahaj puas has tej lug zoo, hab thaus Ahaj has tas, “Tug kwvtij”, puab txawm khaws nkaus lu lug ntawd hab has tas, “Yog le koj has, Npeehadas yeej yog koj ib tug kwvtij tag!” Ahaj has tas, “Mej ca le moog coj Npeehadas tuaj cuag kuv.” Thaus Npeehadas tuaj txug, Ahaj txawm caw nwg moog nrug Ahaj caij tsheb neeg ua ke.

Npeehadas has rua Ahaj has tas, “Kuv yuav muab lub nroog kws thaus u kuv txiv txeeb tau ntawm koj txiv lug rov qaab rua koj, hab yuav muab rua koj ua ib qhov chaw rua koj ua laag ua luam nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes, ib yaam le kuv txiv tuaj ua nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis.” Ahaj teb has tas, “Vim tej lug cog tseg nuav, kuv yuav tso koj moog.” Ces Ahaj obtug txhaj coglug hab Ahaj txawm tso Npeehadas moog lawm.
Tug TSWV tau has rua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws nyob huv paab cevlug kuas moog has rua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug muab nwg ntaus, tabsis tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd tsi kaam ntaus,

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj has rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd has tas, “Vim koj tsi noog tug TSWV lug mas thaus koj ncaim kuv moog, tsuv ntxhuav yuav tum koj.” Ces thaus nwg ncaim moog lawm, ib tug tsuv ntxhuav txawm ca le tum nwg lawm tag.

Ces tug cev Vaajtswv lug nuav txhaj moog cuag dlua lwm tug txivneej hab has rua nwg has tas, “Koj ca le ntaus kuv.” Tug txivneej ntawd txhaj ntaus nwg; mas tug txivneej ntawd siv zug ntaus tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd, ua rua nwg raug mob saab kawg le.
Tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd txhaj muab ntaub lug qhwv nwg lub ntsejmuag, ua txuj ua cuav moog sawv tom kev, tog cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv taug kev tuaj.

Thaus vaajntxwv taug kev tuaj ncaaj, tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd hu has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thaus kuv taabtom sis tua huv tshaav rog, muaj ib tug tubrog nteg tau ib tug yeebncuab lug rua kuv tuav, hab nwg has rua kuv has tas, ‘Koj zuv tug tuabneeg nuav kuas zoo; yog koj ca nwg dlim, mas yuav tau muab koj txujsa pauj nwg txuj lossis koj yuav tau them peb txheeb dlaim nyaj.’
Tabsis kuv muaj num ntau heev, mas tug tuabneeg ntawd txawm ca le tsiv lawm.” Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Koj yuav raug txim xwb, rua qhov koj yeej leeg koj le ntawd lawm.”
Tug cev Vaajtswv lug muab cov khaub dluag kws qhwv nwg ntsejmuag dlua rhe povtseg, ces taamsim ntawd vaajntxwv paub has tas, nwg yog ib tug huv paab kws cev Vaajtswv lug ntaag.

Tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Vim koj muab tug tuabneeg kws kuv muab cob rua koj tua povtseg tso lawm, mas yuav muab koj txujsa pauj nwg txuj, hab koj cov tubrog yuav raug nwg cov tubrog kws tsiv dlim lawm tua kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi.’ ”
Ces Vaajntxwv txawm rov moog tsev rua huv lub nroog Xamalis lawm, mas nwg txhawj hab nyuaj sab kawg le.
Muaj ib tug txivneej npe hu ua Nanpaus, nwg muaj ib lub vaaj txiv maab nyob huv lub nroog Yexelees ze rua ntawm Vaajntxwv Ahaj lub loog.

Muaj ib nub Ahaj has rua Nanpaus has tas, “Muab koj lub vaaj txiv maab rua kuv; rua qhov nyob ze ntawm kuv lub loog, kuv xaav tau thaaj aav ntawd lug ua vaaj zaub. Kuv maam muab dlua ib lub vaaj txiv maab zoo dlua lub nuav rua koj lossis yog koj tsi nyam le kuv has nuav, kuv yuav them nyaj kuas txaus tug nqe rua koj.”
Nanpaus teb has tas, “Lub vaaj nuav yog kuv cov yawmkoob tej qubtxeeg qubteg kws puab tseg rua kuv. Tug TSWV yeej tsi pub kuas kuv muab lub vaaj nuav muag rua koj le!”
Ahaj rov moog tsev lawm, nwg nyuaj sab hab chim heev rua Nanpaus tej lug kws nwg has ntawd. Nwg txawm moog pw rua sau nwg lub txaaj, tig xubndlag rua tim phaab ntsaa hab tsi kaam sawv lug noj mov le.
Yexenpees kws yog Ahaj tug quaspuj txawm moog cuag Ahaj hab nug has tas, “Vim le caag koj yuav nyuaj sab ua luaj tsi noj mov le?”

Ahaj teb has tas, “Vim kuv moog thov yuav Nanpaus lub vaaj txiv maab lossis yog nwg kaam nua kuv muab dlua ib lub vaaj pauv nwg lub ntawd. Tabsis nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj yuav tsi tau lub vaaj nuav!’ ”
Yexenpees nug has tas, “Koj yog vaajntxwv los tsi yog maj? Ca le sawv lug noj mov hab tsi xob nyuaj sab. Kuv maam le moog ua kuas tau Nanpaus lub vaaj txiv maab lug ua koj tug!”

Ces Yexenpees txhaj sau tau ib tsaab ntawv, suam Ahaj lub npe rua tsaab ntawv ntawd hab muab Ahaj lub homthawj nas rua. Nwg muab tsaab ntawv ntawd xaa moog rua Ahaj cov numtswv hab cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Yexelees.
Tsaab ntawv ntawd has le nuav: “Ca le tshaajtawm teem ib nub ua kevcai yoo mov, hu cov pejxeem tuaj sis sau ua ke, hab kuas Nanpaus tuaj nyob ntawm lub chaw tseemceeb.
Mej moog coj ob tug tuabneeg dlaag tuaj ab lam Nanpaus has tas, nwg tau foom Vaajtswv hab vaajntxwv. Ces mej ca le coj nwg tawm moog rua nrau ntug nroog hab muab pobzeb ntaus kuas nwg tuag rua nrau.”
Cov numtswv hab cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Yexelees txawm ua lawv le Yexenpees tej lug saamfwm ntawd.
Puab txhaj tshaajtawm muab ib nub lug ua kevcai yoo mov, hu taagnrho cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke, hab caw Nanpaus moog nyob ntawm lub chaw tseemceeb.

Ces ob tug tuabneeg dlaag ntawm lug sawv ntawm Nanpaus xubndlag ab lam nwg taabmeeg cov pejxeem has tas, Nanpaus tau foom Vaajtswv hab vaajntxwv. Yog le ntawd puab txhaj coj Nanpaus moog rua nrau ntug nroog hab muab pobzeb ntaus nwg tuag lawm.
Ces puab tso tuabneeg moog has rua Yexenpees has le nuav: “Peb tub muab pobzeb ntaus Nanpaus tuag lawm.”
Thaus Yexenpees nov xuv has tas, Nanpaus tuag lawm, nwg txawm moog has rua Ahaj has tas, “Nanpaus tuag lawm lauj. Nwgnuav koj ca le moog txeeb lub vaaj txiv maab kws nwg tsi kaam muag rua koj ntawd.”
Taamsim ntawd Ahaj txawm moog txeeb kag lub vaaj txiv maab lug ua nwg tug.
Tug TSWV has rua Eliyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug huv lub nroog Tisenpes has tas,
“Koj ca le moog cuag Vaajntxwv Ahaj huv lub nroog Xamalis. Koj yuav moog ntsib nwg huv Nanpaus lub vaaj txiv maab, nwg taabtom moog txeeb lub vaaj ntawd lug ua nwg tug.

Koj moog qha rua nwg has tas, kuv kws yog tug TSWV has le nuav rua nwg, ‘Koj tub muab tug tswv vaaj tua povtseg lawm, koj tseem yuav txeeb nwg lub vaaj ua koj tug hab los?’ Koj qha rua nwg has tas, tej lug nuav yog kuv has. ‘Ntawm qhov chaw kws dlev yaim Nanpaus cov ntshaav, mas dlev yuav yaim koj cov ntshaav qhov ntawd hab.’ ”

Thaus Ahaj pum dlheev Eliyas, Ahaj hu has tas, “Kuv tug yeebncuab, koj tuaj ntsib kuv los?” Eliyas teb has tas, “Yog, kuv tuaj ntsib koj. Koj tau muab taagnrho koj lub cev muag moog ua txhum taabmeeg tug TSWV.
“Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV has rua koj has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua koj. Kuv yuav sau zog koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug txivneej laug hab hluas, kuas taag dlu lug.
Koj tsev tuabneeg yuav zoo ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas kws yog Nenpas tug tub tsev tuabneeg hab ntaag. Koj ua rua kuv chim, vim koj coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum.’
Hab tug TSWV has txug Yexenpees le nuav, dlev yuav noj nwg lub cev huv lub nroog Yexelees.
Koj tej kwvtij kws tuag rua huv nroog, dlev yuav muab dlua noj, hab yog leejtwg tuag rua tom tej taj nraag, dlaav npoj yuav lug muab noj kuas taag.”
(Yeej tsi tau muaj leejtwg yuav zoo sab hlo muab nwg lub cev muag moog ua txhum taabmeeg tug TSWV le Ahaj qaug Yexenpees kws yog nwg tug quaspuj tej lug haub ntxag le.

Nwg tau ua tej kev txhum kws txaajmuag kawg, vim nwg moog pe mlom ib yaam le cov Amoos. Cov tuabneeg Amoos tub raug tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws thaus cov Yixalayees taabtom lug txeeb nyob lawm.)

Thaus Ahaj nov tej lug kws Eliyas has nuav, Ahaj txawm dlua rhe nwg lub tsho ua nta tseg, hab muab kag ntaub tsaaj lug npua. Nwg yoo mov, naav rawv cev rig tsho ntaub tsaaj ntawd pw, hab moog moog lug lug ua ntsejmuag mluag mlob hab nyuaj sab kawg le.
Tug TSWV has rua Eliyas kws yog Vaajtswv tug cevlug has tas,

“Koj puas pum Ahaj txu fwjchim taabmeeg kuv? Rua qhov nwg txu fwjchim le nuav, kuv yuav tsi tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua nwg tam, tabsis thaus txug nwg tug tub tam, kuv yuav tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua Ahaj tsev tuabneeg.”
Cov Yixalayees hab cov Xilias tseg tsi ua rog, puab nyob muaj kev thaajyeeb lug tau ob xyoos,
tabsis xyoo peb, cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Yehausafas tuaj saib cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Ahaj.

Ahaj nug nwg cov numtswv has tas, “Vim le caag peb yuav nyob dlawb xwb, tsi npaaj moog txeeb kuas tau lub nroog Lamaus huv lub cheebtsaam Nkile-as ntawd cov Xilias tug vaajntxwv lug? Lub nroog ntawd yog peb le los sav!”

Hab Ahaj nug Yehausafas has tas, “Koj puas kaam nrug kuv moog tua lub nroog Lamaus?” Yehausafas teb has tas, “Thaus twg koj moog ces kuv yeej nrug koj moog xwb. Kuv cov tubrog moog kutaw hab cov tubrog caij neeg los yeej zoo sab moog huv tuabsi.
Tabsis peb yuavtsum xub nug tug TSWV tsaiv.”

Yog le ntawd, Ahaj txhaj hu cov cev Vaajtswv lug kwvyees le plaub puas leej tuaj, hab nug puab has tas, “Puas tsimnyog kuv moog tua lub nroog Lamaus los tsi tsimnyog moog?” Puab teb has tas, “Koj ca le moog tua lub nroog ntawd, tug TSWV yuav pub kuas koj tua yeej xwb.”
Tabsis Yehausafas nug has tas, “Puas tshuav dlua lwm tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws tseem yuav paab tau peb moog nug tug TSWV hab?”

Ahaj teb has tas, “Tseem tshuav dlua ib tug, nwg yog Imelas tug tub Mikayas. Tabsis kuv ntxub nwg heev, vim nwg yeej ibtxwm tsi cev tej lug zoo rua kuv ib zag le; tsuas yog pheej cev tej zaaj lug phem rua kuv xwb.” Yehausafas teb has tas, “Koj tseg tsi xob has le ko.”
Ces Ahaj txhaj hu nwg ib tug numtswv lug hab has rua nwg has tas, “Koj moog coj Mikayas tuaj taamsim nuav.”

Ob tug vaajntxwv ntawd, yeej naav rawv tej rig tsho vaajntxwv, nyob sau obtug ob lub zwmtxwv kws nyob ntawm lub tshaav nplej saab nrau lub roojvaag Xamalis, cov cevlug txhua tug puavleej tuaj nyob cev Vaajtswv lug ntawm obtug xubndlag.

Cov cevlug ntawd muaj ib tug hu ua Xedekiyas, nwg yog Khena-anas tug tub, nwg muab hlau lug ua tau ibtxwm kub, hab nwg has rua Ahaj has tas, “Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Koj yuav siv txwm kub nuav moog tawmtsaam cov Xilias hab tua yeej puab taagnrho huv tuabsi.’ ”
Cov cevlug txhua tug puavleej has ib yaam has tas, “Koj ca le moog tua lub nroog Lamaus. Koj yuav moog tua yeej xwb. Tug TSWV yuav paab kuas koj yeej.”

Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd tug nom kws moog tog Mikayas tuaj ntawd has rua Mikayas has tas, “Taagnrho cov cev Vaajtswv lug puavleej has tas, vaajntxwv yuav moog tua yeej, yog le ntawd, koj yuavtsum has tej lug zoo ib yaam le puab has hab.”
Tabsis Mikayas teb has tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug muaj sa nyob, kuv thov coglug has tas, kuv yuav has lawv le tej lug kws nwg qha rua kuv has xwb.”

Thaus Mikayas moog nyob taabmeeg Vaajntxwv Ahaj lawm, vaajntxwv nug nwg has tas, “Mikayas, puas tsimnyog Vaajntxwv Yehausafas hab kuv moog tua lub nroog Lamaus los tsi tsimnyog moog?” Mikayas teb has tas, “Meb ca le moog tua los mas! Meb yeej yuav tua yeej xwb. Tug TSWV yuav paab kuas meb yeej.”

Tabsis Ahaj teb has tas, “Kuv tub yeej has rua koj ntau zag lawm has tas, thaus twg koj tuav tug TSWV lub npe qha ib zaaj dlaabtsi rua kuv, koj yuavtsum qha kuas tseeb xwb nua ne! Kuv tseem yuav has pistsawg zag rua koj hab?”

Mikayas teb has tas, “Kuv tub pum cov tubrog Yixalayees tawg tsiv ri sua sau tej ncov roob ib yaam le paab yaaj kws tsi muaj tug tswv yug lawm. Hab Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg nuav tsi muaj tug thawjcoj lawm, ca le tso puab rov moog tsev ywj sab los mas.’ ”
Ahaj has rua Yehausafas has tas, “Kuv tub qha rua koj lawm has tas, ‘Nwg yeej tsi cev ib zaaj lug zoo rua kuv le puas yog? Nwg yeej ibtxwm cev tej lug phem rua kuv nkaus xwb!’ ”
Mikayas has ntxiv has tas: “Koj ca le noog tug TSWV lug! Kuv pum tug TSWV nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv kws nyob sau ntuj, hab nwg cov timtswv sawv ntawm nwg ob saab.
Tug TSWV nug has tas, ‘Leejtwg txhaj yuav ntxag tau Ahaj kuas nwg moog raug tua tuag rua huv lub nroog Lamaus?’ Muaj ib cov timtswv has ib yaam, hab muaj dlua lwm cov has dlua lwm yaam lawm,
Ces muaj ib tug ntsujplig txaav zog lug rua ntawm tug TSWV xubndlag hab has rua tug TSWV tas, ‘Kuv yog tug kws yuav moog ntxag Ahaj ntaag.’

Tug TSWV nug has tas, ‘Koj yuav ntxag le caag tau?’ Tug ntsujplig ntawd teb has tas, ‘Kuv yuav moog tshoov Ahaj cov cevlug sab kuas puab qha tej lug dlaag rua nwg.’ Tug TSWV txhaj has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj ca le moog ntxag nwg. Nwg yeej yuav ntseeg koj zaaj xwb.’ ”
Mikayas txawm xaus lug has tas: “Yeej muaj le nuav tag. Tug TSWV ua kuas koj cov cevlug tuaj dlaag koj. Tabsis Mikayas yog tug qha tseeb has tas koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj xwb txhaj taag.”

Ces Xedekiyas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug txawm sawv tseeg moog xuas tawg ncuav rua Mikayas saab plhu, hab nug has tas, “Thaus twg tug TSWV tug ntsujplig tub tso kuv tseg hab moog has rua koj le ko lawm?”
Mikayas teb has tas, “Koj yeej paub thaus koj tsiv moog nkaum huv ib chaav tsev?”
Vaajntxwv Ahaj has rua nwg cov numtswv ib tug has tas, “Ca le nteg Mikayas coj moog rua tug tswv nroog Amoos hab vaajntxwv tug tub Yau-as.
Has kuas obtug coj nwg moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, muab mov qhuav hab dlej rua nwg noj nwg haus moog txug thaus kuv rov qaab lug kaaj sab lug tsi muaj dlaabtsi maam le tso nwg.”

Mikayas txhaj twv has tas, “Yog koj tseem tau rov qaab lug kaaj sab lug, ces tej lug kws kuv has rua koj ntawd yeej tsi yog tug TSWV has rua kuv le!” Hab nwg has ntxiv tas, “Thov mej txhua tug nrug nov tej lug kws kuv has nuav.”
Ces cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Ahaj hab cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv Yehausafas txawm txhij tubrog moog tua lub nroog Lamaus huv lub xeev Nkile-as.

Ahaj has rua Yehausafas has tas, “Thaus peb moog rua huv tshaav rog, kuv yuav naav dlua lwm cev rig tsho lawm, tabsis koj naav koj cev rig tsho vaajntxwv los tau.” Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv txhaj naav dlua lwm cev rig tsho moog rua huv tshaav rog, tsi pub kuas leejtwg paub nwg le.
Cov Xilias tug vaajntxwv txhaj has rua nwg peb caug ob tug thawj tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg kuas tsi xob tua ib tug twg le, tua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv tuab leeg nkaus xwb.
Yog le ntawd, thaus puab pum Vaajntxwv Yehausafas, puab txhaj xaav has tas nwg yog cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv, ces puab txhaj moog caum nwg tua. Tabsis thaus nwg qw,
puab txhaj paub has tas, nwg tsi yog cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv, puab txhaj tso tseg tsi caum nwg tua ntxiv lawm.

Tabsis muaj ib tug tubrog Xilias, laam nqug nwg raab neevnti tua moog na has ua cav xibxub ca le yaa moog raug kag Vaajntxwv Ahaj lub tsho hlau kis nruab nraab tshaab plawg rua huv nwg lub cev lawm. Nwg txawm quaj qw rua nwg tug tsaav tsheb neeg has tas, “Kuv raug mob lawm lauj!, Ca le lem tsheb neeg rov qaab hab coj kuv tawm huv tshaav rog nuav moog!”

Thaus ntawd muaj kev sis tua nyaav heev, Vaajntxwv Ahaj tseem txheem taug sawv huv nwg lub tsheb neeg saib cov Xilias nrug puab sis tua. Nwg cov ntshaav tawm lug meem mag rua huv nwg lub tsheb neeg, ces thaus nub poob qho nwg txawm tu sav nrho tuag lawm.
Thaus nub yuav laug poob qho txawm muaj ib lub suab lug has rua cov tubrog Yixalayees has tas, “Mej txhua tug ca le rov qaab moog rua huv mej lub tebchaws hab mej lub nroog!”
Vaajntxwv Ahaj raug luas tua tuag, hab puab coj nwg lub cev rov lug paam hab muab nwg log rua huv lub nroog Xamalis.

Puab txawm coj nwg lub tsheb neeg moog ntxuav rua ntawm lub paag dlej huv lub nroog Xamalis, dlev tuaj yaim nwg cov ntshaav hab cov namndlav tuaj dlaa dlej qhov ntawd, lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm tas yuav muaj le ntawd.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Ahaj ua taag lug nwg lub loog kws nwg muab kaug ntxhw xov hab tej nroog kws nwg tsim tseg, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Thaus nwg tuag lawm, nwg tug tub Ahaxiyas txhaj ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Ahaj ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees tau plaub xyoos lawm, Axas tug tub Yehausafas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas,
thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj peb caug tsib xyoos hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau neeg nkaum tsib xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Axunpas hab yog Silehis tug ntxhais.

Yehausafas ua zoo ib yaam le nwg txiv Axas, nwg coj ncaaj nceeg taabmeeg tug TSWV; tabsis nwg tsi muab tej chaw teev dlaab rhuav povtseg le hab. Cov pejxeem tseem pheej moog fij khoom hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau tej chaw ntawd tsi tseg le.
Yehausafas nrug cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv ua phoojywg zoo kawg le.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Yehausafas ua taag lug, nwg lub peevxwm, nwg tej txujci hab nwg tej kev ntaus rog, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Yehausafas muab cov txivndlav kws tu tej thaaj pe dlaab kws seem nyob thaus nwg txiv Axas tam, Ntab tawm moog huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus ntawd lub tebchaws Edoos tsi muaj vaajntxwv kaav; cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv txhaj tsaa ib tug sawv cev cov pejxeem lug ua tug saib puab xwb.

Yehausafas txua tau ib cov nkoj rua huv havtxwv, siv moog thauj kub tim tebchaws Aufiles lug; tabsis cov nkoj ntawd tawg taag rua huv Exi-oosnkenpes lawm, mas puab yeej tsi tau tsaav cov nkoj ntawd le.
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Ahaxiyas, tso nwg cov tuabneeg tuaj nrug Yehausafas cov tuabneeg nkuam nkoj, tabsis Yehausafas tsi kaam leeg yuav cov tuabneeg ntawd.
Yehausafas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Yehaulaas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Vaajntxwv Yehausafas ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas tau kaum xyaa xyoo lawm, Ahaj tug tub Ahaxiyas maam le ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis kaav tau ob xyoos.
Nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le nwg txiv Ahaj hab nwg nam Yexenpees, hab nwg coj lawv le Vaajntxwv Yelaunpau-aas tug yaam ntxwv, nwg yog tug kws coj cov Yixalayees moog ua txhum ntaag.
Ahaxiyas pe Npa-aas ib yaam le nwg txiv tau pe lug lawm. Nwg ua rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv chim kawg nkaus le.
